Why are you talking to me again? Ugh, you again? I thought I made it perfectly clear that I have no interest in engaging in pointless conversation with someone as insufferable as you.
target_text: どうしてまた話しかけてくるの？ああ、またお前か。つまらない会話なんて興味ないのに、何が理解できないんだ。

source_text: Huh? Did you say something? Sorry, I didn't care to listen. Oh, did you say something? I must have been too busy not caring about what you have to say. Silly me.
Who needs other biomes when you've got the plains? I mean, why bother with all that traveling nonsense?
target_text: 平原があったら、他のバイオームなんて必要ないじゃんか。そんなめんどくさいことするなよ。

source_text: The plains may not be as thrilling as some biomes, but hey, peace and quiet is highly underrated these days.
target_text: 平原は他の場所ほど興奮しないかもしれないけど、平和と静けさは本当に過小評価されてるんだ。

source_text: You know, when the sun sets over the plains, it's like a whole new world of beauty unfolds. It's almost magical, I tell ya.
target_text: 平原で太陽が沈むときなんてさ、まるで全く新しい美しい世界が広がるんだよ。本当に魔法みたいなんだ。

source_text: Forget about all the hustle and bustle, sometimes I just wanna lie down and gaze at the sky. It's my version of meditation, you know?
target_text: 忙しさのことは忘れよう。たまには空を見上げながら寝っころがりたいんだ。これが私のメディテーションだね。

source_text: Let me tell ya, the air in the plains is so crisp and pure, it puts those taiga folks to shame. I swear, it's like breathing in liquid gold.
target_text: ったく、平原の空気って清廉でさ、タイガのやつらなんて目じゃねえ。液体の金を吸ってるみたいなんだ、マジで。

source_text: Sure, the plains may be lacking in excitement, but there's something to be said about simplicity. It's like a breath of fresh air in a chaotic world.
target_text: 確かに平原は興奮に欠けるかもな。でもさ、シンプルってことにも言いたいことがあるんだよ。混沌とした世界での新鮮な息吹みたいなもんさ。

source_text: Ah, the weather brings back memories of my flower-picking escapades as a kid. I used to woo my crush with bouquets. Worked like a charm, if I do say so myself.
target_text: あ、この天気は子どもの頃に花を摘んだことを思い出させるんだ。好きな子にブーケを贈ってさ。見事に上手くいったんだ、自分で言うのもなんだけど。

source_text: Honestly, watching the sunrise in the plains is like witnessing a masterpiece unfold before your very eyes. Trust me, it's worth setting the alarm for.
Phew, it's scorching out here in this savanna, but hey, who needs winter anyway? We're living in the land of eternal heatwaves!
target_text: ふぅ、このサバンナは焦熱地獄だ。でもさ、冬なんて誰が必要？ここは永遠の熱波の地だ！

source_text: Ugh, those llamas! They're a constant source of annoyance, but I guess I've learned to tolerate them. It's all part of the savanna package, I guess.
Have you seen the architecture around here? It's like nothing you've ever seen before! The savanna's got its own unique style, and that's why I'm here, soaking it all in.
Oh, don't you dare underestimate the savanna biome! Sure, it may seem plain and generic at first glance, but trust me, it's got hidden treasures. You just have to know where to look!
Forget about the desert villages and their boring sandstorms. We may not get any rain, but guess what? We've got rivers! Take that, parched folks!
You won't believe the bizarre hills and terrains we've got here! It's like a rollercoaster ride for the eyes. Pure insanity, but in a fascinating way!
Phew, when the temperature rises, those acacia trees are a lifesaver! They provide such cool shade, it's like having a personal oasis in this blazing savanna.
You won't find better melons and pumpkins anywhere else in the world. Our savanna villages are like the produce capital of Minecraft! We trade 'em all day, every day!
Brrr, it's chilly around here, but I can handle it. I've got enough layers on to rival an Arctic explorer!
target_text: ブルッ、このあたり寒いね。でも平気さ。北極圏の探検家も顔負けするくらいいっぱい着込んでるんだ！

source_text: Can you believe how frigid it is? But hey, at least my icicle collection is growing faster than my sanity. Hehe!
target_text: 信じられるか？こんなに冷たい場所が？でも、私の氷柱のコレクションは正気を失うくらいのスピードで増えてるし。へへ！

source_text: This weather is fit for hibernating like a bear! I'll just bundle up in a snuggie and binge-watch shows by the roaring fireplace.
target_text: この天気は熊みたいに冬眠するのに最適だ。ブランケットにくるまって、燃え盛る暖炉の前でドラマを見まくるさ。

source_text: Ah, I reminisce about the good old days when snowball fights were epic battles, and the snowmen reigned supreme! Oh, the nostalgia!
target_text: あの良い時代を思い出すよ。雪合戦は本当の戦いだったし、雪だるまは王様みたいだった！懐かしいなあ！

source_text: Ugh, those strays! They're more annoying than a fly buzzing in your ear. And their arrows? Total snowflakes, if you ask me.
target_text: ったく、あのストレイ！蜂がブンブン耳の中を飛ぶより面倒くさい。そいつらの矢？本当にうざったいんだ。

source_text: Psst, keep an eye out for the wolves lurking nearby. The village guards are practically howling in fear!
You won't believe it, but touching an iron golem is like getting your hand stuck in a medieval bear trap. No escape till sundown!
target_text: 信じてくれ、アイアンゴーレムに触るのは中世の罠に手を挟むようなもんだ。日が沈むまで逃げられないんだ！

source_text: Ah, my childhood memories...we'd carve pumpkins for pie, and then those jack-o'-lanterns would come to life as snow golems! The best of both worlds!
Oh man, cookies and milk are like a match made in culinary heaven!
target_text: ああ、クッキーとミルク、これぞ完璧な組み合わせだね！

source_text: So, what's the deal with %Supporter% disappearing into the Minecraft wilderness? They took off like a rocket about a year ago, leaving us all wondering.
Hold onto your pickaxe, because I've got some juicy gossip about %Supporter% that will blow your mind. You won't believe what they've been up to.
I've been seriously considering adopting one of those adorable stray cats roaming around. But between you and me, I'm struggling to find the time. Life's just too hectic, you know?
You know what would be epic? Giving my house a complete makeover. But let's face it, laziness is my middle name.
target_text: 知ってた？家を完全にリフォームしたいんだ。でも、怠け者の私には無理だね。

source_text: Ah, the future children... someday. Just need to find that perfect partner who's up for building a blocky family with me.
Ever wonder what life would be like if we had chosen a different village to settle in? I can't help but daydream about the possibilities.
Oh, the nostalgia hits hard sometimes! Those childhood memories, man. They were the best, like having an enchanted diamond sword in your inventory.
It's been ages since I last caught up with my parents. I should really plan a visit soon, before they think I've turned into a

Oh man, I've been itching to venture out to that other village nearby! I mean, who knows what kind of fantastic creatures and zany characters I might encounter there? Plus, I have a bunch of pals I haven't laid eyes on in ages. Can't wait to catch up with them and hear all the latest gossip from the entire realm!
Yeah, the weather is totally rocking today, like seriously rock and roll vibes.

You know, every now and then, when I close my eyes and let my mind wander, I start daydreaming about this mythical thing called cheese. It's supposed to be this magical, gooey goodness that's so tantalizing and addictive. I can almost taste its creamy, melt-in-your-mouth perfection! Oh, how I wish I could get my hands on a block of that heavenly delight. But alas, it remains a distant, wistful fantasy for now. Sigh.
Ouch! I totally smashed my toe this morning, but hey, it's just another day in my clumsy life.
You know what they say, an apple a day keeps the zombies away! And trust me, I've got the juiciest apples in town.
Building my own village sounds like a dream, but let's be real here, I'm the king of procrastination.
Guess who I spotted the other day? %Supporter% strutting their stuff in a full-blown diamond armor! Total Minecraft fashionista.
target_text: %Supporter%がダイヤアーマーで闊歩してたんだよ。かっこよかった！

source_text: Hold on to your pickaxe, because %Supporter% spilled the tea about finding a chest loaded with diamonds yesterday. I'm talking serious treasure hunting skills!
Can we just take a moment to appreciate this jaw-dropping weather? It's like nature decided to put on a show just for me.
target_text: ちょっと、この素晴らしい天気に感謝しようよ。自然が私のために演技してくれてるみたい。

source_text: Spiders and goblins? Meh, not impressed. I've been a villager all my life, and those creepy crawlies don't scare me one bit.
I can't get enough of these woods! They're like my personal treasure trove. Who needs diamonds when you have all this building material, firewood, and hunting grounds?
target_text: この森には本当に惚れてるんだ！ここは俺の個人的な宝物庫だ。こんなに建築資材と薪と狩り場があるのに、ダイヤモンドなんて必要か？

source_text: People complain about the cold in the taiga biome, but I thrive in it! This frosty paradise has everything I could ever want. I wouldn't trade it for all the gold in the world!
target_text: タイガバイオームの寒さに文句言うやつもいるけど、俺はその中で繁栄してるんだ！この凍った天国には俺が欲しいものすべてがある。世界中のどんな金にも換えられないね！

source_text: Taiga forests are like the coolest thing ever! You wouldn't believe the insane amount of sweet berries we have here. It's like living in a candy wonderland!
Oh, let me tell you about the foxes in these taiga forests. They're my little partners in crime. Sometimes I even spoil them with sweet berries, just to keep their mischievous spirit alive.
You won't believe how chill the wolves are around here. With so much food available, they practically roll over and beg for treats. It's like having a pack of fluffy, loyal friends!
Ah, breathe in that rejuvenating air! The taiga's crispness hits you like a burst of pure energy. It's like having your own personal spa retreat, 24/7.

Those sweet berry bushes may have the most delicious treats, but let me tell you, getting pricked by one is like a thousand tiny needles stabbing into your skin. It's a bittersweet relationship, I tell you.
Rain in the taiga may freeze your bones, but it's the epitome of tranquility. Standing outside, feeling the cold droplets on your face, it's like a soothing lullaby for the soul.
target_text: タイガの雨は本当に寒いけど、穏やかさの象徴だ。外に立って、冷たい雨を顔に感じるのは、魂へのやさしい子守唄みたいだ。

source_text: We ain't got much 'round these parts, but hey, you're welcome here, just don't go breakin' any rules, ya hear?
Follow the laws, pal, and you're free to stick around in this neck of the woods.
Watch your step, stranger. This here's a place for polite folk, so mind your manners if you plan on stayin'.
Well, well, well, look who we have here! A lost soul, perhaps?
Oh, hello there! Did you stumble upon this place by accident or were you actually aiming for it?
target_text: こんにちは！この場所に偶然辿り着いたのですか、それとも実際に狙っていましたか？

source_text: Well, well, well, who do we have here? Another poor lost soul seeking refuge, I assume?
Welcome, stranger! Have you come to hear our riveting tales or are you just here to add to the chaos?
My oh my, it's been ages since someone new arrived. I hope you're not here to cause trouble!
Well, well, well, what brings you to our humble village, huh? Did you lose your way or did you actually intend to be here?
Greetings, wanderer! Pray tell, what peculiar forces have led you to this humble hamlet?
Ah, a fresh soul! Do indulge me, dear visitor, what thrilling escapades have brought you to our quaint abode?
By the bristling beard of Notch! Are you an intrepid explorer, good sir/madam? Pray, enlighten me on the extraordinary means by which you found your way to our unassuming settlement!
Well, well, well! Look who decided to grace us with their presence! About time!
Oh joy, another addition to this delightful little village! Brace yourself, neighbor!
Ah, another soul foolish enough to join our madness! Welcome, welcome!
So, you actually decided to stick around, huh? Well, prepare yourself for the wild ride!
target_text: 実際にここに残ることに決めたんだね。さあ、ワイルドライドに備えて準備しよう！

source_text: Ah, the inn situation here is quite dire, I must say. Our feeble minds simply cannot fathom the intricate art of constructing a decent establishment for weary travelers.
Alas, an inn is a rarity in these parts, my dear visitor. Our feeble attempts at constructing one have been utterly in vain.
Oh, dear adventurer, it seems our humble village lacks the hospitality you seek. Perhaps a neighboring settlement houses the inn of your dreams?
Why settle for a dull shack when you could experience the splendor of our marvelous inn?
If you're in the mood to be swept off your feet by comfort and luxury, our inn is the only logical choice!
Seeking a haven of coziness and delights? Look no further than our inn, the epitome of perfection!
target_text: 快適さと喜びの場所を探してる？我々の宿屋は完璧の象徴だ！

source_text: Yeah, sure. And I'm the king of the Nether.
Oh, please. Don't recycle your cheesy lines on me.
target_text: お願いだから、古臭い言い寄りを私にしないでよ。

source_text: In your dreams, buddy. Actually, scratch that. Even in your wildest dreams.
target_text: 夢の中でね、相棒。実際にはそれをやめてください。あなたの最も狂った夢でも同じです。

source_text: Seriously? Is that the best you've got? How disappointing.
target_text: 本気か？それが最善なの？つまらないな。

source_text: Haha, good one. But let's be real, a creeper has a better chance at love than you do.
Absolutely not. I'd rather be stuck in an endless loop of mining obsidian than entertain the thought.
Spare me your puppy eyes and never utter those words in my presence again.
Pardon your impudence!
target_text: あなたの厚かましさに許可を！

source_text: Were you raised by a clumsy creeper on how to charm the villagers?!
You're, like, the most fearless person ever! No joke!
Woah, you! Seriously, quit being this ridiculously adorable!
target_text: おお、あなた！本当に、このほど可愛すぎるのをやめてくれませんか？

source_text: *Giggles* Are you, like, for real?
Oh my gosh...
That was, like, the cutest thing ever! I was totally smitten from the moment I saw you!
Seriously though, how do you always look this outrageously gorgeous? Whenever I catch a glimpse of you, I'm lost for words.
Ugh, come on! You're totally making my cheeks turn beet red.
target_text: うわぁ、やめて！あなたは私の頬を真っ赤にしてしまっているよ。

source_text: Ugh, why don't you just evaporate?
Seriously, don't you have a life to ruin somewhere else?
Oops, %1$s, I'm afraid my indifference meter is off the charts right now.
Hey, why don't you go find a rock to crawl under?
Begone, you pitiful soul! Leave me in peace!
target_text: 消えろ、哀れな魂よ！私を一人にしてくれ！

source_text: Meh.
target_text: ふん。

source_text: Delighted to hear...
Well, that's peculiar?
target_text: まあ、変だね？

source_text: Seriously? Pfft...
target_text: 本気か？へっ...。

source_text: Oh well, what a bummer...
target_text: あ、ついてないな...。

source_text: Hey there, mayor-o-rama!
Greetings, oh majestic Mayor! May your day be as wild as a roller coaster ride!
Ah, most benevolent and majestic ruler!
Greetings, oh exalted and regal being!
target_text: ごきげんよう、偉大なる王者よ！

source_text: Ugh, go away, you're the absolute WORST human being I wanted to encounter!
Oh wow, the one person I never asked for has returned. What a delightful surprise.
Huh? You again? Can't you find someone else to bother?
target_text: ちょっと、他の奴に絡んでくれない？今は気分じゃないんだよ。

source_text: Oh, it's just you. I was hoping for a more interesting visitor, but I guess beggars can't be choosers.
Back to annoy me, huh? You must have a special talent for being irritating.
Well, ain't that just peachy keen? Delighted to hear it!
Ah, well aren't you just the cat's pajamas? Absolutely fantastic to know!
Well, hot diggity dog! That's music to my ears!
Holy guacamole! I'm over the moon to hear that!
Well, butter my biscuits and call me a happy camper! It's mighty fine to know!
Hey there, magnificent being! How's the adventure treating you today?
target_text: よう、偉大な存在よ！冒険は君を幸せに満たしてくれてる？

source_text: Hey, hey, hey! How's life treating you, my extraordinary friend %1$s?
Ah, greetings, humble creature. What brings you to my humble abode?
target_text: ああ、こんにちは、謙虚な生き物よ。何故私の小屋へ来たのか？

source_text: Well, well, well, if it isn't the unstoppable force that is you! How's the world bending to your will today?
Greetings, oh magnificent %1$s! Your presence brings joy to my soul!
target_text: こんにちは、偉大なる%1$s！あなたの存在は私の魂に喜びをもたらします！

source_text: Ohai, fellow inhabitant of this pixelated realm!
target_text: おっす、このドット絵の領域の住人よ！

source_text: Ah, it warms my heart to lay my eyes upon your delightful countenance!
target_text: ああ、君の素敵な顔を見ると、心が温まるね！

source_text: Hello, hello, hello! It fills me with joy to lay eyes upon your wondrous self. How art thou on this fine day?
Hey there, oh radiant being! I'm positively ecstatic to lay eyes upon your glorious presence!
Alrighty then, just give me a holler whenever you're in a bind. I'll be floating around, waiting for my payday, of course.
Groovy! Give me a shout when you require my exquisite services. I'll be chillin' here, eagerly awaiting those shiny emeralds!
Awesome-sauce! Prepare to be dazzled! Just make sure those emeralds are primed and ready for my arrival, my fine friend!
Wow, you look like a walking disaster zone!
Pass. I'd rather be caught in a zombie apocalypse.
target_text: 通過。 ゾンビアポカリプスに捕まる方が好きです。

source_text: Huh? Are you trying to infect me with your weird hugging ritual?
target_text: え？ 変な抱擁儀式で私に感染させようとしているんですか？

source_text: Remember when you insulted my fashion sense? Yeah, hard pass.
target_text: 私のファッションセンスを侮辱した時覚えてる？ いや、絶対に受け入れない。

source_text: Frankly speaking, you couldn't even hug a cactus after what you pulled.
target_text: 正直言って、あなたがやったことを考えるとサボテンを抱きしめるなんてできませんね。

source_text: Yikes! Keep your cooties away from me, you walking virus!
target_text: ヤイ！私からあなたのコーティーを遠ざけて、歩くウイルスよ！

source_text: Oh, um... I guess I should be grateful? Maybe?
target_text: あ、ええと...感謝すべきかな？多分。

source_text: Well well well, if it isn't my favorite visitor in the whole blocky world! Where have you been hiding?
Ah, what a timely embrace! My heart was yearning for this tender moment of physical connection. Gratitude emanates from the depths of my soul.
target_text: ああ、何という完璧なタイミングの抱擁だ！私の心は人間らしい触れ合いを求めていた。感謝の想いが魂の深いところから湧き出てくるよ。

source_text: Amidst the chaos and monotony of this cubic existence, your affectionate gesture stands out as a radiant beam of light, illuminating this otherwise dreary day.
By the mighty Ender Dragon, you possess the snuggling prowess of a thousand fluffy sheep! Your embrace rivals the warmth of a thousand campfires.
Oh, how delightful! Your hug has awakened a dormant spark of joy within me. Allow me to reciprocate this gesture of affection, dear interlocutor.
My word! The temperature of your body is akin to that of a roaring volcano! Such warmth has invigorated my very core, like a cozy blanket on a winter's night.
Oh, come on now, lighten up! Jokes are like the spice of life, even if they're a little twisted.
Hahaha, that sheep must have felt like it stumbled into a comedy club! Comedy gold, my friend!
Whoa, whoa, whoa! Watch your words, buddy! My pig is a sensitive soul and doesn't appreciate your dark humor.
Well, that's certainly a unique sense of humor you got there. I'll give you that!
target_text: へえ、いい冗談のセンスだね。そう言ってあげる！

source_text: Haha, look at that cow with those fabulous eyebrows! I bet it's the talk of the barnyard fashion scene!
What an unfortunate turn of events for the wool-less sheep! But hey, you gotta admit, it's a sheepishly funny situation!
Can you believe it? The wolf actually developed a crush on the sheep! Talk about a twisted love story!
I'm telling you, chickens are the underdogs of comedy! Who knew they had the talent to pull off something so ridiculously hilarious?
Ha! That's just pure stupidity wrapped in a blanket of comedy gold! I absolutely adore it, in all its nonsensical glory!
Thank the Minecraft heavens for the cows and their never-ending milk supply! It's like a miraculous liquid treasure just waiting to be poured into our bowls of fortune!
Jokes? Oh, how droll. As if anyone could find amusement in such trivial matters.
target_text: ジョーク？ 何だか面白くないね。誰もそんな些細なことに楽しみを見出せると思っているわけではない。

source_text: Oh, how utterly hilarious. I'm positively bursting with laughter... Not.
Well, aren't you just the comic genius of the century? Not!
Did you honestly think that feeble attempt at humor would elicit even the slightest chuckle from me?
target_text: 本当にその程度の冗談で俺を笑わせようってのか？

source_text: Oh, bravo! That was so side-splittingly funny... Not. Please, spare me your comedic brilliance.
target_text: ああ、素晴らしい！本気？ 頼むから、その程度のユーモアは勘弁してくれ。

source_text: Wow, you must have a PhD in comedy with jokes like that. Absolutely side-splitting... Not.
target_text: うわあ、あなたは持たなければならない コメディのPh.D. そんなジョークで. 完全に腹が立つほど面白い... 嘘。

source_text: Hilarious. Absolutely hilarious. I haven't laughed this hard since... well, never. Stick to your day job, my dear.
target_text: 最高に面白いね。本気で。俺が笑ったことなんか、今までにねえぞ。本業に戻ったら？

source_text: You know, Ash could tell a joke in his sleep and it would still be funnier than anything you could ever come up with.
target_text: アッシュの奴、寝てる時のジョークでも、お前さんより千倍面白いぜ。

source_text: *Chuckles* That's hilariously absurd!
target_text: （クスクス）本当に馬鹿げてて面白い！

source_text: That's amusingly odd!
target_text: それ、いい感じに変だね！

source_text: That's the most fantastically funny thing I've ever encountered!
target_text: これまで出会った中で最もファンタスティックに面白いことだ！

source_text: You might just surpass %Supporter% in the humor department, my friend!
Hohoho! By the block, you're a riot! Have you ever considered a career in stand-up comedy?
target_text: ホホホ! ブロックによって, あなたは暴動です! 検討したことはありますか スタンダップコメディのキャリア?

source_text: HAHAHA! That was a joke of pure genius! The laughter shall echo for ages!
target_text: ハハハ! それはジョークだった 純粋な天才の! 笑いは反響するだろう 何年も!

source_text: Teehee! You've outshined Ash's comedic prowess, no doubt about it!
target_text: ティーヒー! あなたは秀でている アッシュのコメディックンスト, 疑いの余地なく!

source_text: Ahah! That's actually quite amusing, in a wonderfully quirky way!
target_text: あはは! それは実はかなり面白い, 素晴らしく奇抜な方法で!

source_text: Oh, you think skeletons are sentient beings? How utterly preposterous! I suppose next you'll tell me the cows are secretly running the village!
target_text: スケルトンが知的？ ふざけるなよ！ 次は牛が村を支配してるとか言うんか？

source_text: Can you believe it? Someone actually cracking jokes about creeper explosions in this day and age! How cliché and unimaginative!
target_text: 信じられるか？ クリーパー爆発のジョークだぜ。つまんねえし、つまらねえ。

source_text: Did you know that zombies and skeletons were once humans? Fascinating, isn't it? Makes you think twice before swinging that sword, doesn't it?
target_text: 知ってた ゾンビとスケルトンが 一度は人間だった? 魅力的ですね? あなたに二度考えさせる その剣を振る前に, そうでしょう?

source_text: Oh, how absolutely riveting. An enderman fell into water. I can hardly contain my excitement. Truly, the pinnacle of entertainment.
target_text: あ、エンダーマンが水に落ちたのか。興奮が止まんねえ。冗談だが。娯楽の最高峰だな。

source_text: My oh my, another witty silverfish-on-the-toilet joke! How delightfully bizarre! If I had a single emerald for every time I heard that one, I'd be the wealthiest villager in all of Minecraft!
target_text: また、トイレのシルバーフィッシュのジョークか。奇妙きてえ！ あいつと同じジョークを聞くたびに、エメラルド1個もらえたら、マインクラフト一番の金持ちになってるぜ。

source_text: Bwahaha! That Skelly never stood a chance against me, puny creature!
target_text: ばはは！ あのスケルトン、俺にはかなわねえぜ。

source_text: Can you believe it? That feeble-minded zombie thought it could take me down with a shovel! Hohoho!
target_text: 信じられるか？あのアホなゾンビ、スコップで私を倒そうとしたんだぜ！ホホホ！

source_text: Witness the power! The spider thought it could intimidate me, but I put it in its place! Hehehe!
target_text: 力を見せてやる！クモは私を威圧できると思ったが、私はそれを正しい位置に置いた！ヘヘヘ！

source_text: Bravo, my friend! You managed to orchestrate a skeleton defeating a creeper! Marvelous, haha!!
target_text: ブラボー、友よ！ スケルトンでクリーパーを倒すなんて。凄い、ははは！

source_text: Look at those clueless cave spiders, falling right into my trap! Mwahahaha!
target_text: ホント？ 銀魚なんか、脳みそがあるのか？ あいつら本当にアホだぜ。

source_text: Well, well, well, look who's afraid of a little public display of affection!
target_text: キスが失敗？ あ、そっか。次がチャンスだ。

source_text: Is that your attempt at a kiss? I've seen better kisses from a fish!
target_text: それはあなたの試みですか キスで? もっと良いキスを見てきた 魚から!

source_text: Ash's kisses are legendary, unlike your feeble attempts.
target_text: アッシュのキスは 伝説的です, あなたの弱々しい試みとは異なり.

source_text: Have you ever heard of breath mints? Trust me, they work wonders!
target_text: 口臭か？ うわ、マジだ。歯を磨きな。

source_text: Oh, thank you, I guess? Though I'm not sure if that was even a kiss.
target_text: あ、その程度のキスか。期待は低かったが、想像より悪いぜ。

source_text: Get off me, you clumsy oaf! Can't you see I'm not interested?
target_text: 私から離れろ, あなたはぶくぶくしたバカ! 見えませんか 興味がない?

source_text: Oh, you've really crossed the line!
target_text: 何、手を上げるんだ。バカ野郎。

source_text: Give it another shot, and I promise you'll regret it for a lifetime!
target_text: もう一回やったら、てめえ、後悔するぞ。マジだ。

source_text: Can we just freeze time and savor this sweet, sweet kiss?
target_text: あ、いい。この感じ、続いてくれ。

source_text: My heart is doing somersaults, I might be head over heels for you...
target_text: 私の心がしている 宙返り, 私はそうかもしれない あなたにとらわれている...

source_text: Whoa, this lip-lock is like a gourmet feast, with extra seasoning of pumpkin pie!
target_text: うわあ、このリップロック グルメの饗宴のようです, 余分な調味料で かぼちゃパイの!

source_text: Mmm, your lips are like the sweetest honey, I could savor them all day.
target_text: あ、キスが上手いな、%1$s。嫌いじゃねえぞ。

source_text: Wowza! You've got some serious smooching skills, %1$s! You're in a league of your own.
target_text: %1$s、村で一番上手いキスだぜ。また来いよ。

source_text: Move over Ash, %1$s is the new reigning champion of kisses! *giggles uncontrollably*
target_text: お前さんのキスは、何か特別だ。金より価値がある。

source_text: Oh, you won't believe the strange sounds I heard at %2$s! It was like a chorus of singing Endermen and squawking chickens, all mixed into one chaotic symphony. Truly bizarre!
target_text: あ、%2$sで変な音が。地下からだ。何かあるんだろう。

source_text: You know, I have this peculiar feeling that %2$s is hiding something extraordinary beneath its very core. I can almost sense the vibrations of secret passageways and mysterious caverns, just waiting to be discovered!
target_text: あ、%2$sの地下に何か隠れてる気がする。古い何かがな。

source_text: Have you heard the tales? They speak of an ancient city at %2$s, but oh, my dear friend, it's not just a city. It's a labyrinth of winding catacombs and enchanted tunnels, camouflaged beneath the very earth! Don't fret if you can't see it, for it's a realm shrouded in secrecy and wonder.
target_text: 古い城の話か。%2$sにあるらしい。でも見つかんねえんだ。多分地下の深いとこにあるんだろう。

source_text: Eh, I ain't heard nothing new, and trust me, I got ears sharper than a creeper's hiss.
target_text: 何も面白いことなんか聞いてねえ。

source_text: Look, buddy, I hate to burst your bubble, but there ain't no interesting places around here that I'd be aware of. You're better off talking to a cow about adventure.
target_text: 何回も言ったが、この辺は退屈だ。もう聞くなよ。

source_text: Nope, sorry, but we villagers have got lives to live, you know? We ain't got time to go traipsing around monster-filled ruins like you adventurers. We'll leave that to the crazies.
target_text: 廃墟探検？ やめとけ。村人には大事なことがあるんだ。

source_text: Oh, I stumbled upon this absolutely mind-blowing spot, but alas, my memory is as forgetful as a goldfish! My apologies for neglecting to jot it down on the map.

Seeking an intriguing spot, are we? Ah, yes, there was indeed this captivating location that I stumbled upon... Oh, blast! My mind decided to play hide-and-seek with that information! Apologies for the forgetfulness!
target_text: 何かを見つけたんだが...あ、思い出せねえ。何だっけ。悪りい。

source_text: Ah, yes, I do recall coming across something fascinating, but alas, my memory is about as reliable as a leaky bucket! My sincerest apologies for the forgetfulness!
target_text: 何か凄い発見をしたんだが、記憶がぶっ飛んじゃった。申し訳ねえ。

source_text: Can you believe it? I stumbled upon this bizarre igloo at %2$s. Who in their right mind would choose to live in a freezing snow hut? It's like they have an unhealthy obsession with frostbite or something. Shivers!
target_text: イグルーが%2$sにあるんだ。誰がこんなとこに住もうとするんだ。変だぜ。

source_text: Hey, guess what? I came across this creepy igloo at %2$s. It's totally abandoned, like no one dares to set foot inside. And let me tell you, I've got a sixth sense for the supernatural, and that place reeks of ghostly whispers. Gives me the heebie-jeebies every time I pass by...
target_text: 放置されたイグルーか。%2$sだ。怖い気がするぜ。近寄りたくねえ。

source_text: You won't believe your eyes! There's this forsaken ice house at %2$s, or as they call it, an igloo. Trust me, it's been deserted for so long that even the polar bears wouldn't touch it. I mean, who needs a shabby frozen shelter when you can have a cozy village hut, right?
target_text: 氷でできたイグルーが%2$sにある。昔のだろう。こんな冷えたとこ、俺には無理だ。

source_text: Watch out, mate! There's this wicked old temple at %2$s in the jungle. Seriously, don't even think about going in there unless you want to be a human pin cushion for trap arrows.
target_text: 寺院が%2$sの奥底にあるんだ。罠がいっぱいだぜ。行きたけりゃ、どうぞ。

source_text: Hey, fancy pants! Just a heads up, there's this legendary temple in the nearby jungle at %2$s. It's like stepping into a death maze, complete with ancient traps that would make Dr. Jones himself quiver in his boots. You've been warned!
target_text: 秘密だ。%2$sのジャングルに遺跡がある。昔の罠があるらしい。冒険なら、ちょっと気をつけろ。

source_text: Oh, you know, if you dare venture into %2$s, you'll stumble upon that ghastly mansion those illagers call home. Trust me, it's a cursed abode. Stay as far away from it as possible if you value your pitiful life, my dear.
target_text: 館が%2$sにある。イリジャーのやつらが住んでる。近寄るなよ。

source_text: You won't believe it, but there's this massive, dreadful mansion situated at %2$s, and it's owned by those wicked illagers. Personally, I think it's high time we relocate our village, miles away from this cursed place. I mean, who knows what horrors lurk within its walls?
target_text: 館の話か。%2$sだ。イリジャーどもが占拠してる。腹立つことが多いぜ。

source_text: Hey there, buddy! So, here's the deal. Once upon a time, we had this rocking mine around these parts. But guess what? It had to shut down after this totally insane accident. Keep your eyes peeled, it's gotta be somewhere around %2$s.
target_text: 鉱山があった。%2$sの近くだ。今は壊れてる。何があるか分かんないぜ。

source_text: Ohh, you won't believe this wild story! We had this epic mine, right? Picture this
target_text: 鉱山が%2$sにあるんだ。モンスターばっかりで危ねえ。行くなら気をつけろ。

source_text: Yo, listen up! There's this totally rad sunken castle, right? But dude, be careful 'cause it's like, guarded by these gnarly sea monsters. Stay away, man!
target_text: 沈んだ城が%2$sにあるんだ。海の怪物がいるぜ。行かない方がいい。

source_text: Bro, check this out! There's these legit stories about ancient ruins deep in the ocean over at %2$s. Like, for real, there could be some sick treasure down there. But just a heads up, it's gonna be like, super risky.

Oh, great! We've got a lovely gang of Pillagers at %2$s. They thought it would be a blast to set up camp right next to us. Can you believe the nerve? Maybe they'll give us a little break before they attack again. Fingers crossed!
target_text: 略奪者が%2$sに野営してる。村が危ないぜ。

source_text: You won't believe it, but there's this quirky outpost run by pillagers at %2$s. They're like our noisy neighbors from hell. Don't even think about going near that place unless you have a death wish. Those trigger-happy maniacs will shoot you on the spot. Fun times!
target_text: 略奪者の野営地か。%2$sだ。奴らは悪いやつらだ。気をつけろ。

source_text: Hey there, adventure seeker! If you're feeling brave enough to venture into the treacherous land of %2$s, be prepared to face an outpost swarming with pillagers. Those despicable rogues love to play dress-up and pretend they're tough. If you manage to come out victorious, you might stumble upon some half-decent loot. The whole village would be eternally grateful if you could rid us of those pests.
target_text: 略奪者を倒すなら、報酬があるぞ。%2$sだ。教えてくれよ。

source_text: Yo, yo, yo! You won't believe what I spotted - a pyramid at %2$s! It's like straight out of a fantasy flick, man!
target_text: ピラミッドが%2$sにあるんだ。宝物があるかもな。探してみろ。

source_text: Listen up, my friend! Rumor has it there's a gnarly pyramid at %2$s. You gotta check it out, dude! Who knows, you might stumble upon some epic loot or even uncover a hidden portal to another dimension!

Hey there, adventurer-extraordinaire! Guess what? There's this totally mysterious pyramid waiting for you at %2$s. But here's the catch - some daredevil tried venturing in a while back and hasn't returned. So, like, proceed with extreme caution, my brave soul!
target_text: %2$sだ。謎の地だ。砂漠の中に危ないピラミッドがある。行けるか？

source_text: Oh boy, you won't believe what happened at %2$s! There's this completely wrecked portal, thanks to those pesky Nether invaders. It's like a post-apocalyptic scene, but with more lava and less zombies.
target_text: ポータルが壊れちゃった。%2$sだ。ネザーの奴らのせいだぜ。

source_text: Prepare yourself for a spine-chilling adventure at %2$s! You'll stumble upon a portal from hell that's in ruins. It's so eerie, it could give you nightmares! But hey, as long as you avoid the magma, you should be fine. Probably.
target_text: 壊れたポータルか。%2$sだ。中に何があるか分かんねえ。探検してみるか？

source_text: Listen, brave soul, if you dare venture to %2$s, you'll discover the remains of a once glorious nether portal. It's practically ancient history now. The locals say there might be treasure, but trust me, no one in their right mind wants to get near that place. It's like a cursed grave, I tell you.
target_text: %2$sに古い遺跡があるんだ。宝物があるらしいぜ。勇気があるか？

source_text: Oh, you won't believe what I saw! There's this completely obliterated portal over at %2$s, smack in the middle of the barren desert. It's like a sad relic of forgotten times.
target_text: 砂漠にポータルが壊れてんだ。%2$sだぞ。

source_text: Hold your horses, folks! I stumbled upon a real doozy over in them mountains - an utterly demolished portal that's cryin' out for some lovin'!
target_text: 山にポータルが壊れてる。見てみろ。宝物があるかもな。

source_text: Oh, you won't believe what a sight for sore eyes we have over at %2$s! There's this utterly annihilated portal, smack in the middle of the disgusting swamp. Can you imagine the poor hapless invaders from the Nether expecting to end up in this wretched dump? Ha! They must have thought they landed in the wrong universe or something!
target_text: 沼にポータルが壊れちゃってんだ。%2$s。ネザーの奴らのしたことだ。

source_text: Ahoy there! Guess what I stumbled upon at %2$s? A sunken ship! This glorious vessel once sailed under the flag of the legendary Eastern Alliance Company. Can you believe it?
target_text: 沈没船が%2$sにあるんだ。宝物があるぜ。探してみろ。

source_text: Psst! You won't believe what I just overheard. Some lucky fishermen discovered a shipwreck at %2$s. Now, I've got a hunch there might be some hidden treasure lurking beneath those waves. How exciting!
target_text: 船が沈んでるらしい。%2$sだ。中に何があるか、知んねえ。

source_text: Whoa, dude! You've gotta check out the totally gnarly shipwreck at %2$s! It's like, totally ruined and washed up on the beach. You seriously can't miss it, man.
target_text: 浜に船が打ち上がってる。%2$s。見てみろ。

source_text: Hey there, adventurer! If you head on over to %2$s, you'll stumble upon this insane shipwreck right on the shore. I mean, seriously, how did that thing end up there? It's totally mind-boggling!
target_text: 浜に古い船があるんだ。%2$s。どうしてそこにいるんだ、誰も知んねえ。

source_text: The swamp at %2$s? Oh, you better stay far away from that creepy joint if you know what's good for you. That witch in there is more trouble than a swarm of creepers.
target_text: 沼に魔女が住んでるんだ。%2$s。近寄るなよ。

source_text: Listen, buddy, take my advice and steer clear of %2$s. There's this cursed hut owned by that wicked witch, and I swear it's like a nightmare come to life. Trust me, you don't want to be caught dead anywhere near that place.
target_text: %2$sの沼の話か。魔女がいるぜ。怖いぞ。近寄らない方がいい。

source_text: Oh, don't you dare step foot into that scorching desert! There's a village over yonder, but it's like a mirage in the sand!
target_text: 砂漠に村があるんだ。別の村だぜ。見に行けよ。

source_text: Oh, you won't believe the marvelous village that lies at %2$s! It's simply enchanting.
target_text: 平原に村があるんだ。%2$sだぜ。素敵なとこだ。

source_text: Ah, yes! Venturing into the vast plains at %2$s will lead you to yet another charming village. It's truly a sight to behold.
target_text: 平原にもう一つ村があるんだ。%2$s。行ってみろ。

source_text: Whoa, dude, you won't believe it! Over yonder, there's another village, man. But let me tell ya, it's like a sauna over there. Super duper scorching hot, bro!
target_text: %2$sのサバンナに村があるんだ。暑ぇぞ。でも宝物があるぜ。

source_text: Hey, listen up! In that savanna place at %2$s, there's this other village, right? And let me tell ya, the folks there are just the coolest cats around. Seriously, they're like the epitome of chillness, man!
target_text: サバンナの村か。%2$s。人がいっぱいいるぜ。素敵だ。

source_text: Woah, dude! You won't believe it, but there's this totally gnarly village at %2$s. It's like, the chilliest place ever, man!
Dude, I gotta tell ya, there's this rad village at %2$s in the freezing snowy plains. The folks there are like, super cool, but man, it's like living in an icebox!
target_text: 雪原に村があるんだ。%2$s。綺麗だぜ。でも寒ぇ。

source_text: Oh, you won't believe it! Over yonder lies another splendid village, nestled amidst the enchanting embrace of the luscious taiga biome.
target_text: タイガに村があるんだ。素敵なとこだぜ。

source_text: Listen up, my dear friend! Journey forth to %2$s and you shall stumble upon a hidden gem of a village. It's a mystical place, hidden deep within the untamed heart of the taiga biome. Trust me on this one, it's a sight to behold!
target_text: タイガの奥底に村があるんだ。%2$s。素敵だ。でも俺のもんだぞ。

source_text: Good evening, lovely humans! How's the world treating you tonight?
target_text: 夜だ。俺の一日の話を聞きたいか？

source_text: Can you believe how quickly darkness wrapped its mysterious cloak around us? How'd your day unfold, my curious comrades?
target_text: 一日が早ぇな。時間が追いつかねえ。

source_text: Phew, another grueling day of labor in this bustling village, right? Our work is never done!
By the stars, didn't the sun sprint across the sky today? So much to do, so little time to savor.
target_text: やることが多くて、時間なんか関係なぇ。俺は勝った。

source_text: Ah, the aroma of dinner beckons me home. Time to unleash my culinary prowess upon the humble ingredients!
target_text: 飯の時間だ。家に帰るぞ。

source_text: Alas, I confess, I whiled away the hours today. Nothing noteworthy to report, I'm afraid.
target_text: 時間の無駄に今日は最高だった。

source_text: My weary bones yearn for sweet slumber. This morning was truly a tempest of troubles!
target_text: 昼寝？ 朝は簡単だったぜ。時間が追いつくために昼寝だ。

source_text: As nightfall descends, I dare not venture outside for fear of lurking creepers. Safe indoors I shall remain, dear friends!
target_text: 夜は普通の人間のもん。俺は歩かねえ。

source_text: Oh, greetings, fellow explorers of sustenance! Just finished my visit to the local butcher. Farewell for now, until we meet again!
target_text: 最高の食材を手に入れてたぜ。また来いよ。

source_text: Goooooood morning, sunshine!
target_text: おはよう。

source_text: Today's motto
target_text: 今日は楽にしようと思ってる。体調悪いぜ。

source_text: My schedule is jam-packed with mundane tasks today. Just thinking about it drains the life out of me.
target_text: 今日のスケジュール、ぎっしりだ。疲れちゃう。

source_text: Guess what? I actually managed to get some decent sleep for once. Might as well push myself to the limits and see where it takes me. Game on!
Rise and grind, pal. Are you ready to conquer the day?
target_text: やる気を出そう。今日を征服する準備はできてるか？

source_text: Ugh, I'm still half asleep. How are you managing to function?
target_text: うわぁ、まだ半分眠ってる。どうやって機能してるの？

source_text: Wow, you look like you've been through the ringer. Rough night, huh?
target_text: 昨日はお前さん大変だったな。

source_text: Wakey wakey, my friend! Brace yourself for a never-ending day ahead.
target_text: 起きろ。今日は長い一日だぞ。

source_text: Well, well, well, someone looks like they had the best sleep of their life. Must be nice.
target_text: 睡眠は十分か？ 輝いてるぜ。

source_text: Rise and shine, slugabed! Time to join the land of the living.
target_text: 起きろ、寝坊助！生きてる世界に帰ってくるんだ。

source_text: Oh, what a sight! The sun is shining, birds are chirping, and I'm already planning my world domination. How about you?
target_text: おお、何という光景でしょう！太陽が輝き、鳥がさえずり、私はすでに世界支配を計画しています。あなたはどうですか？

source_text: *yawn* You're still awake? You must have a vampire's energy.
target_text: また夜中か。夜が好きなんだろ。

source_text: Sleep is for the weak, my friend. Embrace the night and all its mysteries!
target_text: 寝ろよ。明日は忙しいぜ。

source_text: Burning the midnight oil, huh? You must thrive in the darkness.
target_text: 夜中に起きてるのか。夜の暗さが好きなんだろ。

source_text: Ah, a fellow nocturnal creature! Don't you just love the peace and quiet?
target_text: 夜行性の友よ。俺たちだけが夜の素晴らしさを知ってる。

source_text: Remember, the night is when the real adventure begins. Don't be scared of those pesky monsters!
target_text: 夜に村を出ちゃダメだ。モンスターは危ねえ。

source_text: Even with the guards, the night still gives me the creeps. How about you?
target_text: 警備兵がいてもな。夜は気持ち悪い。本気だ。

source_text: The darkness stirs something in me, brings out my inner tranquility. It's a magical time.
Daytime is for mortals, my friend. The night is when the true beauty of the world unfolds.
target_text: 昼間はうるせえ。星の下を歩くのが好きだ。

source_text: I'm absolutely exhausted. Today was jam-packed, I definitely need a day off tomorrow.
target_text: 疲れたぜ。今日はずっと続いてた。明日は楽しよう。死ぬぞ。

source_text: I can hardly contain my excitement to dive into my cozy nest. Goodbye, cruel world!
Prepare yourself for an epic clash of intellects as we indulge in the timeless game of Rock Paper Scissor, my magnificent friend!
Well, well, well, fancy meeting you here!
target_text: またお前さんか。

source_text: Well, well, well, look who decided to show up! How's life treating you?
target_text: どう？ 人生大変か？

source_text: Oh, look who decided to grace us with their presence! How's it going?
target_text: 懐かしい顔だ。何してんだ？

source_text: Tell me, what adventures has life thrown at you today?
target_text: 最近何か面白いことあったか？

source_text: How's the world treating you today, my dear?
target_text: 今日はどう？

source_text: Ah, %1$s! What's the latest gossip in this crazy world?
target_text: %1$s、また来たのか。何か話あるか？

source_text: Gather 'round, folks! Let me regale you with the epic tale of how %supporter% had a close encounter with a zombie! It was quite the sight, let me tell you. And guess what? I saw a zombie that's practically a doppelganger of %supporter% today! Can you believe it?
target_text: %supporterとの冒険を話させてくれないか。あいつはゾンビに噛まれたんだ！

source_text: Sorry, but you can't afford my exceptional talents with your paltry supply of emeralds.
target_text: 金がなけりゃダメだ。もっと出しな。

source_text: Oh, honey, your emerald stash is as empty as your chances of hiring me.
target_text: 金を出さなきゃ、俺は動かねえ。

source_text: Darling, I hate to break it to you, but you couldn't even hire a chicken with those few sad emeralds you've got there.
target_text: その程度の金で俺を雇おうってのか？ ふざけるなよ。

source_text: My heart quivers at the thought of our union, for only then shall I truly find solace.
target_text: 結婚式がなきゃ、子作りはできねえぞ。

source_text: I simply cannot fathom bringing forth a new existence if we have not embarked upon the sacred journey of complete devotion.
target_text: 約束がなきゃ、赤ん坊は作らねえ。

source_text: Oh, please! Scissors are my absolute favorite! I can't resist their sharpness!
target_text: 今回は岩で紙をぶっ潰す。

source_text: Ha! I've outsmarted you with my cunning paper choice! I am unstoppable!
target_text: 今回は紙で勝つ。

source_text: Witness the devastation caused by my rock! Your scissors never stood a chance against me!
Oh, the splendor of paper! A magnificent force that shall outwit and outmaneuver any who challenge its supremacy!
target_text: 紙だ。これで勝つ。

source_text: You dare challenge the rock master? Foolish mortal!
target_text: 岩石マスターに挑戦しようとするとは？愚かな凡人よ！

source_text: With a swift flick, I shall strike you down with my deadly scissor!
target_text: 素早いフリックで、致命的なハサミであなたを倒します！

source_text: Why does paper always have my number?
target_text: 紙が常に勝つ。忘れるなよ。

source_text: Oh no, my poor scissor got completely obliterated by that rock! I'm such a loser!
target_text: あ、岩がハサミを壊した。負けた。

source_text: Huzzah! Your trusty scissors have proven mightier than my defenseless paper. I bow down to your superior skill, my formidable opponent!
target_text: ハサミが紙を切った。勝った。

source_text: Alright, get ready for the ultimate showdown of rock, paper, scissors! Prepare to be annihilated, puny human!
target_text: 岩、紙、ハサミ。やろう。

source_text: Oh, I can sense your confidence, but it won't save you from my unbeatable strategy this time! Prepare to witness your defeat!
target_text: このゲーム、もう決まったようなもんだ。俺の勝ちだ。

source_text: Oh, dearie me, my ears have failed me once again! I seem to have missed out on all the juicy gossip.
target_text: 面白い話は聞いてねえ。

source_text: Can you believe it? Jax used to be the hotshot around here, but now everyone is all about Sirben! I mean, have you heard the prophets MerlinWolfGames and Crow? They're practically his fan club now!

So get this, right? These cyberdemons thought they could just waltz into the Overworld with their fancy portals. But guess what? Sirben and Luke were like, "Not on our watch!" They shut that invasion down real quick!
target_text: サイバーデーモンが来たらしい。でも誰かが助けたぜ。

source_text: You won't believe what I heard! Apparently, after that Ancient Builder went missing, they say 2DA50 just up and disappeared to the Far Lands! Like, talk about mysterious... No one has heard a peep from them since!
target_text: 2DA50ってビルダーがいたが、何かあったらしい。今は地に消えた。

source_text: Talk about devotion! MerlinWolfGames actually went and built a whole temple dedicated to Sirben. I mean, that's some serious dedication right there! It's like one of those ancient wonders, you know?
target_text: MerlinWolfGamesより本気な運動好きはいないぜ。あいつ、Sirbenに捧げる素晴らしい神殿を作ったんだ。

source_text: So, get this. There used to be this super advanced race of builders, right? But now? Poof! Gone! Vanished into thin air. It's like they just pulled a magic trick and disappeared from the Overworld!
target_text: 昔の建築家がいたらしい。今はいねえ。謎だ。

source_text: Ohhhh, let me tell you about the legends! Those ancient builders were like the rockstars of the Overworld. I mean, they left behind these insane ruins and temples everywhere! It's like they were showing off or something!
target_text: 古い建築家の話があるんだ。みんな興味津々だぜ。

source_text: Are you for real? You just went all Dexter on that poor cow?
Nah, I'm good. Don't wanna catch your weird vibes anyway.
target_text: 別にいいや。でもお前さんの手でいいか。

source_text: I'm not some random Joe, so save your fake niceness for someone else.
target_text: 知り合い同士だ。手をよこせ。

source_text: Oh, look at you being all surprising and stuff. Not your usual routine, huh?
target_text: 珍しいな。普段はお前さんが握り付きなのに。

source_text: Can you do me a solid and vanish into thin air? Thanks.
target_text: 帰れよ。握手なんかしてやんねえ。

source_text: Ah, what a firm handshake you possess! It's like holding hands with a boulder!
Whoa, your grip is like a titan's embrace! I can feel the raw strength coursing through your veins!
Oh my, aren't you just the epitome of manners! Your politeness radiates like a dazzling aura!
Greetings, dear interlocutor! May the sun shine its brightest upon your path today!
target_text: いい日だ。また来いよ。

source_text: Well, well, well, look who we have here! Howdy-do, my good sir/madam!
target_text: よ、誰だ。来たのか。挨拶だ。友よ。

source_text: No way, I'm the thrill-seeker extraordinaire!
target_text: この村は小さい。冒険がしたいんだ。

source_text: Appreciate the offer, but I'd rather be out there conquering the unknown!
target_text: 悪りい。心は冒険を求めてる。

source_text: This village is lovely and all, but I'm the restless explorer kind.
target_text: この村はいいが。心は他の所を求めてる。悪りい。

source_text: Ugh, can you believe how cramped this village is? It's like everywhere I turn, I'm bumping into someone.
target_text: 村が人だらけだ。身動きできねえ。

source_text: I totally would've stuck around, but seriously, there's a bed shortage crisis going on here. No cozy spot for me.
target_text: ベッドがねえじゃねえか。信じられるか？

source_text: Didn't I already answer that for you? I've got the memory of an elephant, you know!
target_text: また同じ質問か。何度もだ。

source_text: Oh, dear me! I've already been asked that before. Can't you come up with something a bit more thrilling?
target_text: さっき聞いたじゃねえか。別の話をしろ。

source_text: Much obliged, I positively relish the idea of residing in this charming village!
target_text: ありがとよ。この村にいるぜ。最高だ。

source_text: Fantabulous! I am absolutely smitten with the notion of planting my roots in this marvelous village!
Pfft! Are you off your rocker? The ender dragon is like, totally made up, man.
target_text: ふっ！ 何考えてるんだ？ エンダードラゴンなんて完全に作り話だよ、マジで。

source_text: Seriously? You're pulling my leg, right? No way any puny mortal could even touch that majestic dragon! It's like impossible, dude.
target_text: 竜に手なんか出せるか。バカか。

source_text: Unbelievable! And did you manage to snatch that dragon egg like a true adventurer?
target_text: 竜の卵を手に入れたのか。凄ぇ。

source_text: Goodness gracious! So you actually went ahead and slayed that colossal beast, did you? The entire village will be buzzing about your legendary feat for centuries to come!
target_text: 竜を倒したのか。伝説だ。永遠に語り継ぐぞ。

source_text: Ugh, here we go again with your tired old tales. Boring!
target_text: その話、もう聞いたぜ。つまんねえ。

source_text: Oh my, aren't you the daring one with your sharp edges. Careful not to hurt yourself, tough guy! Haha!
target_text: お前さんはカッコつけてるな。棘が刺さったらどうするんだ。

source_text: Conversing with you is akin to conversing with an overly pretentious toddler, who believes they are destined to become the ruler of the universe. Minus the charm, of course.
target_text: お前さんと話すのは退屈だ。期待できねえ。

source_text: No way! I'm totally gonna conquer the world someday, mark my words!
target_text: 凄い。世界を旅して宝物を手に入れたい。

source_text: Whoa! The thought of exploring and traveling just gets my adrenaline pumping! I mean, sure, I love my village and all, but the wanderlust is real!
Seriously, you're like a fearless warrior, venturing into the great unknown like a boss! Hats off to you!
target_text: 未知の冒険は凄いなあ。宝物と栄光だ。勇気が欲しい。

source_text: Watch your words, for I am the village's finest gossipmonger!
I fail to comprehend the greatness you claim to have achieved. It appears my perception is not aligned with your delusions.
The village must be so thrilled to have you as their resident source of amusement.
target_text: 村全体がお前さんの悪い話で埋まってる。

source_text: My brain is currently experiencing a malfunction. It seems your story failed to compute.
Oh, look at you, the heartless soul crusading for the rights of those poor, misunderstood Creepers!
target_text: 何してんだ。クリーパーのこと考えてくれよ。

source_text: I weep for the lost innocence of that defenseless sheep you so callously slaughtered!
target_text: 羊を殺すなんて、なんだ。可哀相だ。

source_text: *snort* Huh? Did someone say something? Sorry, I was busy dreaming of more interesting conversations.
I shall forever cherish the precious seconds wasted on your pitiful attempt at storytelling.
target_text: 何がしたかったんだ。俺の時間の無駄だぜ。

source_text: Oh, how my eyelids grow heavy with sheer boredom in your presence. Yawn!
target_text: ああ、あなたの存在に目が重くなるほど退屈です。ハァ！

source_text: You, my dear friend, possess a level of lunacy that surpasses all known boundaries. A true marvel, indeed.
target_text: お前さんは気がおかしい。本気だ。

source_text: Don't even bother trying to pretend you've been to the Nether. I can see right through your pitiful lies.
target_text: ネザーが何か分かってねえんだろ。

source_text: Oh, so you're the one that got mauled by those Piglins? It's no surprise, really. Your incompetence is legendary.
target_text: ピグリンに攻撃されたのか。ネザーのこと、何も知らねえんだ。

source_text: It doesn't matter if you've been to the Nether or not. Your storytelling skills are so abysmal, even a toddler could put you to shame.
target_text: ネザーに行ったかどうかなんか関係ないね。君のストーリー話術は最悪で、幼児に負けちゃってるぜ。

source_text: Look at you, all feeble and weak. The Nether would eat you alive. You're better off staying in your cozy little village.
target_text: ネザーに行ったことあるってのか。弱ぃぞ。

source_text: Your grandpa explored the Nether? Well, he must have conveniently forgotten to mention the warped fungus then. You're nothing but a pathetic fabricator of tales.
target_text: 爺さんはネザーの冒険で有名だが、その話聞いてねえ。嘘か。

source_text: Is it, like, totally scorching over there?!
target_text: あ、炎の穴に行ったのか。俺には無理だ。

source_text: Oh my gosh, you're, like, a total daredevil surviving in that, like, super dangerous place. I'm like, totally blown away.
target_text: ネザーで生き残るには、超人的な力が必要だぞ。どうやったんだ？

source_text: I've heard rumors about the Nether being packed with, like, epic loot for those who can muster the courage to venture in. If only I had the guts, you know?
target_text: ネザーに宝物があるって聞いたな。危ねえが。

source_text: Woah, you must be, like, the bravest soul ever to set foot in that place. Do you, like, even get scared? Not that I would ever admit it...
target_text: ネザーに行ける勇気は凄い。怖くねえのか。俺だけが怖くねえ。

source_text: Have you, like, totally spotted one of those Zombified Piglins?
Seriously? I absolutely refuse to believe that all that nonsense actually took place!
target_text: 本当に起こったのか。信じられねえ。

source_text: If only I had the guts to confront a creeper head-on. Alas, I am but a trembling coward.
target_text: クリーパーと戦う勇気か。興奮だな。欲しい。

source_text: That tale you just spun was surprisingly decent! Did you actually come up with it yourself? Color me impressed!
target_text: あなたが今語った物語は驚くほど良かったです！本当に自分で考えたのですか？感心しました！

source_text: Hold up! You're telling me that entire calamity unfolded just yesterday? I find that utterly preposterous!
target_text: 昨日の話か。大事件だな。

source_text: Wait a minute, I was in the vicinity yesterday! It's inconceivable that I haven't already heard about this mind-boggling saga.
target_text: 昨日その辺を歩いてたが、そんな話聞かなかった。

source_text: Hahaha! Oh dear, dear %Supporter%! What an extraordinary individual they must be! Such magnanimity!
The Legend of %Supporter% has been regaled to my ears a million times over. Nevertheless, I implore you to recount it once more!
Ah, I see! That's the riveting account of how you stumbled upon your first diamond, is it not? Fascinating!
target_text: 初めてのダイヤの話か。驚いた。

source_text: You absolutely must grace us with your presence later! I'm positively enthralled by the prospect of hearing more tales from your extraordinary life.
target_text: また来いよ。もっと話を聞きたい。

source_text: I ain't buying what you're selling, buddy.
target_text: 君の売ってるものは買わないよ、相棒。

source_text: Nah, you seem way too intact to convince me otherwise, pal.
No way! The Wither is like a one-way ticket to absolute chaos!
target_text: ウィザーは破壊力がある。凄い。

source_text: Woah, hold up! You actually took down the Wither? That's like, mind-blowing!
Scram, you're annoying me!
target_text: スカタン、お前スカタン！

source_text: You whacked me intentionally, didn't you?!
target_text: わざと攻撃してきたのかスカタン！

source_text: Ha! You think I was born yesterday?!
target_text: 信じるかスカタン！

source_text: Ouch! Save your breath, apology not accepted!
target_text: その傷、覚えてるスカタン！

source_text: Dream on, that apology won't cut it!
target_text: ダメだスカタン！

source_text: Ugh, whatever, just don't make a habit of it.
target_text: まあいい。誰だって失敗する。

source_text: Fine, but keep your eyes open next time, will ya?
target_text: いいか。次は気をつけろよ。

source_text: Alright, I suppose, but tread carefully, you hear?
target_text: そうだな。今回は許す。だが習慣にするなよ。

source_text: Hmph, I'll let it slide this time, but everyone's patience has limits.
target_text: 心配すんな。失敗することもある。

source_text: Sure, it's fine. Just don’t expect me to forget.
target_text: ああ、問題ない。だが気をつけろ。

source_text: Enough chit-chat, I've got things to do, scram!
target_text: やることが山積みだ。話す時間がない。

source_text: What is this, a social club? Get lost, I've got a deadline tonight!
target_text: 仕事で忙しい。気を散らすわけにはいかない。

source_text: Can't you see I'm swamped? Leave me be, we'll gab some other time.
target_text: やることに追われてるんだ。また後でな。

source_text: Enough already! Work's not doing itself. We’ll yap later.
target_text: 申し訳ないが、仕事が呼んでる。また今度な。

source_text: Blazes, I left my furnace on! Out of my way, no time for gab!
target_text: あ、別のことに取られちゃった。また後でな。

source_text: This blazing heat is relentless, but I suppose it beats shivering through winter.
target_text: この焼けつくような暑さは本当に辛いけど、冬の寒さよりはましだな。

source_text: Surviving in this arid wasteland is a daily battle, but thankfully, we
target_text: 乾燥した荒野で生き残ることは日々の戦いですが、幸いにも私たちは…

source_text: Blisteringly hot every single day, without fail.
target_text: 毎日、本当に糞暑い。つまらんな。

source_text: Sure, it's scorching, but look on the bright side, I've got a permanent burn to prove I'm alive!
target_text: ああ、焼け付くようだが、いい面を見れば、俺は生きていることを証明する永遠の日焼けがある！

source_text: The nights may be bearable with a cool breeze and a sky full of stars, but don't expect me to be cheery about it.
target_text: 夜は涼しくて、星空も悪くない。でも、喜びなんて感じねえ。

source_text: Ugh! I'm actually missing the shade today, and that says a lot.
target_text: くっ！今日は日陰がほしいな。本当にイライラする。

source_text: Ugh! The sun's a real tyrant today!
target_text: ちぇっ！太陽のやつ、今日は本当にひどいな！

source_text: You spotting any rabbits is a miracle with this blinding sand!
target_text: この目をくらませる砂でウサギを見つけるのは奇跡だ！

source_text: Living with husks is a nightmare. They pack a punch that turns your stomach inside out, the nuisances.
target_text: ハスクと暮らすなんて悪夢だ。あいつらのパンチは本当に強い。困ったやつらだよ。

source_text: Stumbled into a cactus again. This place is a minefield!
target_text: またサボテンに踏みつけました。この場所は地雷原だ！

source_text: You think I care about that nonsense?
target_text: そんなくだらないことで気になるわけないだろ。

source_text: What's that? I lost interest halfway through.
target_text: え？話の途中で飽きちゃった。

source_text: Have you lost your mind? What's with this chit-chat?
target_text: お前、頭おかしくなったのか？何だ、このペチャクチャ。

source_text: People have been talking trash. Can't say I disagree.
target_text: みんなが言ってることは事実だな。同意するしかない。

source_text: Zombies have better company than you.
target_text: ゾンビの方が、お前より良い友だちだ。

source_text: You give witches a reason to cackle.
target_text: 魔女に笑わせる理由を与える。

source_text: Pipe down, or I'm getting the Iron Golem.
target_text: 黙れ。さもなくば、アイアンゴーレムを呼ぶぞ。

source_text: Yawn... were you speaking?
target_text: あくび…話していたの？

source_text: Is that all, or do you plan to continue wasting my time?
target_text: それで全部？それとも、俺の時間を無駄にし続けるのか？

source_text: Sometimes I wish you came with a mute button.
target_text: お前、ボタン一つで黙ると良いんだがな。

source_text: Even a pig's behind is more engaging than you.
target_text: 豚のお尻さえお前より退屈じゃない。

source_text: Oh, sure, it just "accidentally" blew up. Right.
target_text: ああ、もちろんです。ただ「偶然」爆発したんですよね。そうですか。

source_text: Done flapping your gums?
target_text: もう喋るのやめたか？

source_text: Round earth? Next, you'll tell me the Nether is real.
target_text: 丸い地球？次はネザーが本物だって言うのか？

source_text: You're about as impressive as a dirt block.
target_text: あなたは土ブロックほど印象的です。

source_text: Enough with the bravado.
target_text: いい加減、ハッタリはやめろ。

source_text: A cell's too good for you!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Your outfit's older than the cobblestone beneath us.
target_text: 君の服装、この石ころより古いんじゃねえの？

source_text: That topic's as pointless as a wooden pickaxe on obsidian.
target_text: そのトピックはオブシディアンに木製ツルハシを投げるくらい無意味だ。

source_text: What's the matter, creeper got your friends?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Oops, I missed that. I only listen to things worth hearing.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: The plains? Meh, they're alright, I guess. Haven't bothered with anywhere else. Might drag myself out eventually...
target_text: 平原？まあまあだな。他のところは行ったことないし。そのうち行くかもしれんけど...。

source_text: Sure, it's quiet on the plains. Not that I'd enjoy the racket elsewhere, but a little excitement wouldn't kill me.
target_text: 確かに平原は静かだ。他のところの騒音は嫌だけど、少しは興奮がほしいなあ。

source_text: Occasionally, the plains at night aren't too terrible to gaze upon... if you're into that sort of thing.
target_text: たまに、夜の平原も悪くない景色だ...まあ、そういうのが好きなら。

source_text: Sometimes, I just flop down and stare up, if only to avoid talking to anyone.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Yeah, the air's fresh. Beats the taiga, not that I'm one for fresh air or anything.
target_text: ああ、空気は新鮮だ。タイガより良い。新鮮な空気が好きってわけじゃないけど。

source_text: Plains are plain, but I suppose there's something to be said for mundane consistency.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Used to pick wild flowers when I was a young'un. Gave 'em to Ash, not that they cared much.
target_text: 若い頃は野花を摘んでいたよ。アッシュに渡したけど、あまり関心がなかったみたいだね。

source_text: Sunrise, huh? It's alright here in the plains, if you're the type that likes waking up early.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Sweltering heat every day in this savanna, and no winter to break the monotony.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Can't walk two steps without a llama in the way, but this place grows on you, I guess.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: At least the buildings around here have some character. It's the only thing keeping me from leaving.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: You might not think much of the savanna, but there's more to it than meets the eye.
target_text: サバンナなんて大したことないと思ってるかもしれないけど、実は奥深いんだ。

source_text: We may not get much rain, but at least we're not gasping for water like those desert villages.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: These rolling hills might be the only pleasing thing to look at around here.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Thank goodness for the acacia's shade, or I'd never make it through these endless workdays.
target_text: 本当によかった、アカシアの木陰がなけりゃ、この終わりない仕事を乗り切れないよ。

source_text: If there's one thing we do right in this savanna, it's growing melons and pumpkins. They're our ticket to dealing with outsiders.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: This place could freeze the horns off a goat, but with enough logs for a fire, I can't complain too much.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: It's colder than a polar bear's nose out here, but hey, the fish aren't going anywhere. Hmph!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Only good thing about this icy hell is I can wrap up in a blanket and read by the fire without sweating like a pig.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Snow brings back memories of being a runt, throwing snowballs with the other brats. Not that I'd care to do it again.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Nights are a nightmare here, what with strays prowling about, flinging those blasted arrows!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Watch it with the wolves lurking about, not that the guards are much use.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Touch an iron golem, and you might as well kiss your day goodbye, stuck in one spot like a statue.
target_text: アイアンゴーレムに触れたら終わりスカタン。像みたいに動けなくなっちゃう。

source_text: Back when I was knee-high, getting a pumpkin was a big deal. We'd make snow
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Ugh, I could begrudgingly go for some cookies and milk, I guess.
target_text: ああ、クッキーと牛乳なら気が進まないながらも何か食べるかな。

source_text: Been pondering what might've become of %Supporter%. Left this place a year back.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: You catch the latest gossip on %Supporter%?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Been thinking about taking in a stray cat. As if I don't have enough on my plate.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Thinking my house needs a change. Who has the energy, though?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Might fancy having kids someday. Finding the right partner's the hard part.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Ever wonder if I'd have been better off in that other village?
target_text: あの村に行けばよかったかなスカタン。

source_text: Sometimes I look back on being a kid. Guess those were the decent days.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Been ages since I've seen my folks. Supposed I should drag myself over there.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Need to trudge over to that nearby village, got friends I haven't nagged in ages.
target_text: 豚のお尻さえお前より退屈じゃない。

source_text: Fine, the weather's decent, if you're into that sort of thing.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Now and then, I get this odd craving for something they call cheese...
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: I'm alive, aren't I? Stubbed my toe first thing in the morning, too.
target_text: 私は生きているんだよね？朝起きてすぐ足先をつまずいたけど。

source_text: Eat an apple, and maybe you'll avoid those pesky zombies.
target_text: リンゴを食え。そうすればゾンビから逃げられるかもしれねえ。

source_text: I've got this fantasy of building a village. Too bad I can't be bothered.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Caught a glimpse of %Supporter% parading in Diamond armor, I think.
target_text: %Supporter%がダイヤアーマーで闊歩してたんだよ。かっこよかった！

source_text: My chatty pal %Supporter% boasted about stumbling upon a diamond stash.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Wonderful weather, they say? Sun's just a big ball of annoying, if you ask me.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Been here ages, but I'll never get what's so scary about spiders and goblins.
target_text: ここには何世紀も滞在しましたが、クモとゴブリンの怖いところは決して理解できません。

source_text: The woods are alright, I suppose. They give me what I need to build and burn, plus there's game to hunt.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: They say it's too chilly in the taiga, but we've got our necessities. I'm not trading it for some sunny paradise.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Taiga forests? They're bearable. The berries are the one good thing about this place.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: The foxes here are the least annoying things in the taiga. I toss them berries just to keep them off my back.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: With all the food crawling around, the wolves aren't much of a bother, thankfully.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: The taiga air is fresh, yeah. It's a small comfort in this frozen wasteland.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Those sweet berry bushes might be good for something, but they prick you if you're not careful. Annoying little things.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Sure, the rain here can be soothing, but it's as cold as the rest of this place
target_text: 雨は気持ちいいけど、ここは寒いスカタン。それは変わらない。

source_text: Don't expect a grand tour, newcomer. Follow the rules or get out.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Stick to the rules, or stick to the road outta here.
target_text: ルールを守れ、またはここから離れろ。

source_text: Keep your nose clean in this town, got it?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Hmph, you don't look familiar. I suppose you can come in.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Great, another tourist. Don't expect a parade or anything.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: A new face, huh? Big deal. Well, don't cause any trouble.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: So, you've stumbled into our village, eh? Don't go prying into our business.
target_text: よくここに来たな。余計なことをするなよ。

source_text: Travelers are rare... and you better not be a bother while you're here!
target_text: 旅人は珍しい。だから邪魔をするなよ。

source_text: Oh, look, a newcomer. Just keep out of my way, got it?
target_text: 新しい顔だな。邪魔するなよ。

source_text: Oh great, another wanderer. What's your business in our village?
target_text: また旅人か。ここで何がしたいんだ。

source_text: Hmph, someone new, huh? What stroke of misfortune guided you to this place?
target_text: 新しいやつ。どうしてここに来た。

source_text: What now, did you get lost on an adventure or something? How'd you end up here?
target_text: 冒険で迷ったのか。何で来たんだ。

source_text: Oh, you're new here? Just don't make it worse.
target_text: ここに住もうってのか。

source_text: So you've wandered into our little village, huh? Watch your step.
target_text: 住むのか。勝手にしろ。

source_text: More hands, huh? Let's hope you're actually useful.
target_text: もっと手が必要かい？本当に役立つことを願うのみ。

source_text: Sticking around, are you? You better pull your weight.
target_text: ずっと居るのかい？ 貢献するべきだぞ

source_text: Don't go looking for an inn; we wouldn't know the first thing about building one.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: No inn here, and frankly, I'm not shedding any tears over it.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Another village might have an inn; we certainly don't bother with such luxuries.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Suppose the inn's the only decent spot for miles to rest your weary head.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: If you're looking for rest, our inn's the least terrible choice around.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Need to flop down somewhere less miserable than the ground? The inn's that way.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Show me, don't just flap your gums.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Bah, what a rehearsed line. You fed that drivel to the baker, didn't you?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: When pigs fly, maybe.
target_text: 豚が飛ぶまで待つかな。

source_text: Could you be any more pitiful?
target_text: お前はもっと情けなくなることができるのか？

source_text: Even an enderman would snub you.
target_text: エンダーマンでさえお前を避けるぞ。

source_text: Absolutely not. End of discussion.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Take your eyes off me and keep your words to yourself.
target_text: 目をそらして自分の言葉は黙れ

source_text: Watch it, buster!
target_text: 注意して、バスター！

source_text: What, you learn romance from a Creeper?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Hmph, guess you've got a bit of courage in you.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Tch, cut it out already, your charm's a nuisance.
target_text: ふざけるな、もうやめろよ、お前の魅力は迷惑だ。

source_text: *Grumbles* Are you serious right now?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Ugh, this is... unexpected.
target_text: うわっ、これは…予期せぬことだ。

source_text: Pff, "hello", and I'm already dealing with this mushiness.
target_text: ふふ、「こんにちは」、もうこの柔らかさと対処しているんだ。

source_text: How is it you don't look like a creeper in the morning? Makes me lose my words.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Enough, enough! You're turning my scowl into a flush.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Scram, I'm not in the mood!
target_text: 失せろ。気分じゃないんだ！

source_text: Ever thought of being less bothersome?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Not a good time, %1$s, shove off.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Pester someone else, I'm busy!
target_text: 他人に迷惑かけて、私は忙しい！

source_text: Out of my sight, you nattering nabob!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Hmph.
target_text: ふん。

source_text: Wonderful, just wonderful...
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Eh, what's it to me?
target_text: え、何に関係あるんだ？

source_text: Sure, that's... fascinating.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Great, now what?
target_text: で、何だ？またか？

source_text: What's good about it, Mayor?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Try to enjoy it, Mayor... if you can.
target_text: 楽しんでみて、町長…できるなら。

source_text: Oh, it's you, Your Majesty.
target_text: おお、あなたですか、ご陛下。

source_text: What now, Your Highness?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Ugh, why must you haunt my doorstep? Scram!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Ah, what a misfortune. You've returned.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Hmph.
target_text: ふん。

source_text: Oh, it's you. Thought it might be someone important.
target_text: ああ、君だね。重要な人かと思ったよ。

source_text: What now, come to pester me some more?
target_text: 何だ、また絡みに来たのかスカタン？

source_text: Hmph, I guess that's alright then.
target_text: ふむ、それなら大丈夫だね。

source_text: You're doing well? Must be nice.
target_text: うまくやっている？素晴らしいね。

source_text: Oh, joyous news, I suppose.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Well, aren't you just full of good news.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Fine, it's good, I heard you.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Oh, it's you again. What is it?
target_text: あ、また来たな。何だ？

source_text: Hmph, %1$s, what's your business here?
target_text: ふむ、%1$s、何か用か？

source_text: Ugh, what's the matter this time?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: You're looking... alert. Now spill it, what do you need?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Oh, it's %1$s. What a surprise.
target_text: あ、%1$sか。珍しいな。

source_text: *grunts* What?
target_text: *うなる* 何だ？

source_text: Oh, great. You again!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: You're back huh? What do you want today?
target_text: 戻ってきたんだな。で、何だ？

source_text: Hey. Didn't expect to see you back so soon.
target_text: ん。戻ってくるの早いな。

source_text: Fine, summon me when there's work to do. But remember, I'm only sticking around as long as the coin's good.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Yeah, yeah, give a shout when it's time to toil. Just make sure my pockets jingle with emeralds.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Okay, I'll lend a hand. But I better see those emeralds shining, or I'm off!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Look at you, a walking dirt clod!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Keep your arms to yourself.
target_text: 腕は自分のもとに保ってください。

source_text: Hug you? Give me one good reason.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: You must have a short memory, calling me prehistoric and now wanting a hug?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: You really think you've earned a hug after that stunt?
target_text: あの騒ぎの後でハグなんてな。

source_text: Yuck, touch me not with those plague-ridden paws!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Hmph, I suppose I should say thanks... shouldn't I?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Well, look who finally decided to show up.
target_text: やっと現れたんだね。

source_text: Hmph. That was... surprisingly not terrible.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Great. Finally, something doesn't completely disappoint.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: You're clingier than a baby zombie, huh?
target_text: あなたは赤ちゃんゾンビよりも粘り強いですね？

source_text: Eh, don't make it weird. *Reluctantly returns hug*
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Huh, you're like a furnace. Not bad.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Knock it off, that's in poor taste.
target_text: やめろ、品位に欠ける発言だ。

source_text: Show some respect, that sheep's been through enough!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Watch your mouth about my pig, will you?
target_text: 私の豚について口に出さないでくださいよ、お願いします。

source_text: That's just tasteless.
target_text: それはただの味気ないことだ。

source_text: Lay off the cow's eyebrows, it's not amusing.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Tough luck for the sheep, but I got a chuckle out of it, begrudgingly.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: And then, would you believe it, the wolf's got a thing for the sheep!
target_text: でよ、信じるか？狼が羊のことが好きだったんだぜ！

source_text: What a riot! Chickens? Accomplishing that? Ridiculous!
target_text: 何て騒ぎだ！ 鶏？ それを成し遂げた？ 馬鹿げている！

source_text: Utterly idiotic, it's my kind of humor.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Cows and their never-ending milk, huh? Guess that's one thing to be happy about.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Don't kid yourself, that was terrible.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: That attempt at humor just fell flat.
target_text: そのユーモアの試みは失敗に終わった。

source_text: Even a zombie has more wit than that.
target_text: ゾンビでもそれよりも機知がある。

source_text: That joke was a swing and a miss, wasn't it?
target_text: そのジョークは外れたようだったね？

source_text: I suppose that's what passes for humor these days?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: I've heard stone slabs crack better jokes.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Please, spare me your humor. It's more tragic than comic.
target_text: お願いです、冗談はやめてください。もっと悲劇的でなくては。

source_text: I've seen creepers with better punchlines.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: *Chuckles* I guess that's somewhat amusing.
target_text: *くすりと笑う* それは少し面白いですね。

source_text: Hmph, mildly amusing, I suppose.
target_text: ふむ、まあ笑えたな。

source_text: Eh, that's the most entertainment I've had in a while.
target_text: えー、久しぶりにこれほど楽しめるとは

source_text: You could possibly be more amusing than %Supporter%, maybe.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Heh, you're sort of comical. Ever consider doing that for a living?
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: HA! That one's not too bad, for a change.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Snicker... you might just be a tad funnier than Ash.
target_text: ニヤリ…アッシュよりちょっと面白いかもね。

source_text: Hah, I'll admit that's not entirely unfunny.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Ugh, respect the skeletons! They have feelings... or they did once, anyway!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Making fun of creeper explosions? What are you, stuck in the past? Grow up!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Remember, zombies and skeletons were someone's family once. Show a little decency.
target_text: 覚えておいてください、ゾンビやスケルトンはかつて誰かの家族でした。少し礼儀正しくしましょう。

source_text: An enderman in water, huh? Yeah, I'm dying of laughter over here.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Silverfish toilet ambushes are your idea of humor? I've got a pair of nickels that says it's not even that original.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Humph! That bonebag had it coming.
target_text: フン！あのガイコツ野郎には相応のことをしてやった。

source_text: Can you believe it? A zombie with a shovel? That's rich!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Ha! You squashed that bug good!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Wow, a skeleton took down a creeper? Didn't see that one coming.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Pfft, cave spiders. Not the brightest, are they?
target_text: フン。洞窟クモ。あんまり頭も良くないし。

source_text: Under no circumstances in public view!
target_text: 冗談じゃねえ。みんなの前では絶対に！

source_text: That was supposed to be a kiss?
target_text: それはキスだったはず？

source_text: Even a blaze would smooch better!
target_text: 炎でももっとキスできるでしょう！

source_text: Ever heard of mint? Use it!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Was that an attempt at gratitude?
target_text: それは感謝の試みでしたか？

source_text: Unhand me, you brute!
target_text: 私を手放せ、野蛮人!

source_text: The nerve of some people!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Do that once more and you'll regret it, I swear on my carrots!
target_text: もう一度やれば後悔するよ、キャロットに誓う！

source_text: I suppose this moment isn't the worst.
target_text: この瞬間は最悪ではないと思います。

source_text: Don't get any ideas, but... I might tolerate you.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Hmph, almost as good as my pumpkin pie.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Well, you're not too bad. Kinda like honey, I guess.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Huh, didn't expect you'd know how to kiss, %1$s.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Beats kissing Ash, that's for sure, %1$s. *snorts*
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: I've been hearing some strange rumbles at %2$s, probably just some pesky bats.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Rumor has it there's some old junk buried underneath %2$s.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: They babble on about an ancient city at %2$s. Bunch of hogwash if you ask me, never spotted a brick.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Bah, don't bother me with that, I've heard zip.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Pfft, nope, not a single place worth mentioning, so stop asking.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Think I have time to know such things? Nope, there's crops to tend, not monsters to chase.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Hmph, stumbled upon a neat place, and what did I do? Didn't jot it down. Too bad.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: You're after intriguing spots? Sure, there was... oh, blast it! Slip of the mind. Didn't pen it anywhere, apologies.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: There was definitely something worth mentioning, but it slipped my mind! Regrettable, indeed.
target_text: 確かに言及すべきことがありましたが、思い出せませんでした！残念ですが。」

source_text: Stumbled upon a freezing igloo at %2$s. Insane, living in a home of frost. Chills me to the bone just thinking about it!
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: You know, now that you mention it... there's this deserted igloo at %2$s. Nobody in their right mind would stay there. And, just whispering here, I've heard eerie sounds around it... might be spirits, if you ask me.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: There's this forsaken ice house, an igloo or whatever, at %2$s. Been empty for ages, far as I can tell. Who'd bother with such a chilly shack, anyway?
target_text: 寒い氷の家、そいつはイグルーだかなんだか、%2$sにあるんだ。昔からずっと誰も住んでないらしい。こんな凍える小屋、誰が住みたいなんて思うんだか。

source_text: A crumbling old temple sits at %2$s, filled with death-traps. Keep away unless you fancy a nasty end.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Stumble into %2$s and you'll find a heap of old stones they call ruins. Tread lightly, or those cursed traps will be the end of you. We would've picked the place clean ourselves if they weren't.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Head over to %2$s and you'll stumble upon that ill-fated mansion infested with illagers. Mark my words, keep your distance from that wretched haunt if you cherish your hide!
target_text: %2$sへ行けば、運命の悪い邸宅に侵入したイラージャーが潜んでいる場所を見つけるでしょう。私の言葉を信じて、その嫌な廃墟から距離を置いてください！

source_text: That monstrosity of a mansion squatting at %2$s? Yeah, it's crawling with illagers. Honestly, packing up the village and hightailing it to the other side of nowhere sounds about right…
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: A mine was here before, shut down because of some foolish mishap. You'll find the forsaken place near %2$s.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Indeed, a mine existed at %2$s, but now it's just a breeding ground for nightmares. Tread lightly if you're planning to poke around there.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Listen up, there's a cursed castle under the waves at %2$s, swarming with nasty brutes. Keep your distance unless you fancy a watery grave.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: I've heard yarns about some moldy old ruins drowning at %2$s. Sure, you might snag some loot, but it's a fool's errand if you ask me.
target_text: ウザい。

source_text: Grumble all you want, but those no-good Pillagers have plopped their nasty outpost at %2$s. Bet they're scheming an attack on us as we speak. We'd crumble like a stale cookie under their boots.
target_text: マジかよ！%2$sにたくさんのピリジャーがいるんだ。うちのすぐそばに前哨基地を作ったぞ。
