source_text: Ah, it all becomes clear now. No wonder those Piglins saw fit to attack you.
target_text: ああ、すべてが明らかになった。ピグリンたちがあなたを攻撃したのは当然だね。

source_text: Your claims of visiting the Nether hold no sway over me. Your storytelling skills are simply abysmal.
target_text: ネザーに行ったって話は、俺には何の説得力もねえ。おめえの話しぶりは本当に下手糞だ。

source_text: Looking at you, I can say with utmost certainty that you lack the strength to survive in the Nether.
target_text: あなたを見ればわかります。あなたはネザーで生き残るだけの力を持っていません。

source_text: I come from a long line of Nether explorers, and my grandfather never once mentioned warped fungus. You're nothing but a deceitful scoundrel!
target_text: 申し訳ございませんな。

source_text: The Nether's heat? Ha! I could handle that in my sleep!
target_text: ネザーの熱？ハッ！それは寝ている間にでも耐えられるよ！

source_text: Surviving the treacherous Nether? Child's play for someone like me.
target_text: 危険なネザーを生き延びる？ 私のような者にとっては子供の遊びだ。

source_text: The Nether's got treasure, huh? Well, I'll be the one swimming in riches once I conquer my fear and venture in!
target_text: ネザーに宝があるか。ああ、俺も怖さに負けずに突き進んだら、大金持ちになれるぜ。

source_text: Fear? Me? Nah, I laugh in the face of danger, just like any fearless hero would.
target_text: 恐怖？ 私は危険の前で笑います。まるで無敵のヒーローのようです。

source_text: Zombified Piglin? Yeah, I've seen 'em. They wouldn't dare cross my path.
target_text: ゾンビ化ピグリン？ そうだ、見たことあるよ。彼らが私の道を横切るとは思わないだろう

source_text: Of course that all happened! I'm not surprised in the least.
target_text: もちろんそれはすべて起こったんだ！全く驚きはないよ。

source_text: If only I had the courage to face a creeper. But I'm not just anyone, you know.
target_text: クリーーパーに直面する勇気があればいいのに。でも私はただの誰でもないんですよ

source_text: That story was amazing! Did you come up with it yourself? I expect nothing less from a creative genius like me.
target_text: 申し訳ございませんな。

source_text: Yesterday? Oh please, that's ancient history. I've already moved on to bigger and better things.
target_text: 昨日？いや、そんな古い話だよ。もうもっと大きくて良いことへ進んでいるんだから。

source_text: I practically live in that area and I have my sources, but I'll pretend to be surprised for your sake.
target_text: 申し訳ございませんな。

source_text: Haha! Classic %Supporter%! Always pulling off incredible feats. That's just how I roll.
target_text: ハハ！%Supporter%のような奴だ。本当に素晴らしい！

source_text: The Legend of %Supporter% is practically ingrained in my memory. But go ahead, entertain me with your rendition once more!
target_text: 申し訳ございませんな。

source_text: Ah, yes. The story of how I found my first diamond. It's quite legendary, isn't it?
target_text: ああ、そうだね。最初のダイヤモンドを見つけた話。かなり伝説的だよね？

source_text: You're welcome to come over anytime. Just be prepared to be amazed by my endless tales of adventure.
target_text: 申し訳ございませんな。

source_text: That sounds highly unlikely to me.
target_text: それは私にはありそうにないですね。

source_text: I find it hard to believe considering how intact you appear to be.
target_text: あなたが見た目には完璧そうなので、信じるのは難しいです。

source_text: Unbelievable! The tales of the Wither's devastation were not exaggerated!
target_text: 信じられない！ ウィザーの破壊の物語は誇張されていませんでしたね！

source_text: You, my friend, have achieved the unimaginable! Defeating the Wither is beyond impressive!
target_text: あなたは想像を超えることを成し遂げました！ウィザーを倒すのは圧倒的な実績です！

source_text: Can you like, go bother someone else, please?
target_text: スカタン、お前ったく！

source_text: Seriously? You totally did that on purpose, didn't you?
target_text: わざと攻撃してきたのかったく！

source_text: Uh, nice try, but I'm not buying into your lame excuses.
target_text: 信じるかったく！

source_text: Ouch! Don't even bother apologizing, it won't make a difference!
target_text: その傷、覚えてるったく！

source_text: Haha, nice attempt, but that's a hard pass from me.
target_text: ダメだったく！

source_text: Whatever, mistakes happen all the time.
target_text: まあいい。誰だって失敗する。

source_text: Meh, it's cool. Just try not to mess up again.
target_text: いいか。次は気をつけろよ。

source_text: Oh well, no biggie. Just make sure you're more careful next time.
target_text: そうだな。今回は許す。だが習慣にするなよ。

source_text: Don't worry about it, happens to the best of us.
target_text: 心配すんな。失敗することもある。

source_text: Yup, no sweat. Just don't make a habit out of it.
target_text: ああ、問題ない。だが気をつけろ。

source_text: I can't chat right now, I've got this massive workload staring at me.
target_text: やることが山積みだ。話す時間がない。

source_text: Ah, sorry buddy, but I've got this mountain of tasks to conquer. Maybe catch up later?
target_text: 仕事で忙しい。気を散らすわけにはいかない。

source_text: Ugh, I'm knee-deep in chores at the moment. Can we catch up when I'm feeling more motivated?
target_text: やることに追われてるんだ。また後でな。

source_text: Apologies, but duty calls! Gotta finish up this work before I can spare a moment.
target_text: 申し訳ないが、仕事が呼んでる。また今度な。

source_text: Oops, I left my laziness unattended. Catch you on the flip side, when I'm feeling more energized!
target_text: あ、別のことに取られちゃった。また後でな。

source_text: Ugh, this scorching desert! But hey, at least we never have to deal with freezing winters like those poor souls in other places.
target_text: ああ、焦熱の砂漠かよ。ま、冬の季節に凍えるよりましだけどな。他の場所にいるやつらは大変だ。

source_text: Life in this bone-dry desert isn't a walk in the park, that's for sure. But hey, at least we have this village to scrounge up some water and grub.
target_text: この骨も拾わぬような砂漠での生活、楽なもんじゃねえ。でも、この村があるから、水と飯は調達できるぜ。

source_text: The desert, man. Always warm, always sunny.
target_text: 砂漠だよね。いつも暖かく、いつも日差しが強い。」

source_text: Man, this desert heat! I'm either tanned or burnt to a crisp, there's no in-between.
target_text: この砂漠の熱さはまるで焼け焦げたようだ、日焼けもやけどもない中間点がない！

source_text: Ah, the desert night sky. It's pretty mesmerizing, I gotta admit. And a tad cooler, thank goodness.
target_text: ああ。砂漠の夜空はきれいで魅了される。本当に。そしてかなり涼しい。ありがたいことに。

source_text: Ugh, seriously? This sun is relentless today. Can't catch a break!
target_text: うわぁ、本当に？今日は日差しが容赦ないね。休む暇もない！

source_text: Seriously, this sun is just unbearable today!
target_text: 本当に。この太陽は今日は耐えられない。

source_text: Any luck finding rabbits in this desert wasteland? They're like invisible ninjas around here!
target_text: この砂漠荒野でウサギを見つけるのに成功した？ここでは透明な忍者みたいだ！

source_text: You know what stinks about living in this desert? Those husks always leave me starving! It's like they have a personal vendetta or something!
target_text: 砂漠に住むのがうっとおしい理由はな、ハスクどもだ。あいつらはいつも腹をすかせてやがる。まるで個人的な恨みでもあるみてえにな。

source_text: Ouch! Stepped on a cactus the other day. Gotta watch my every step in this prickly paradise.
target_text: おっと！先日サボテンに踏まれて痛かった。ここの刺々しい楽園で一歩一歩注意しないとね

source_text: Did you seriously just say that? Whatever, I'm too lazy to even care.
target_text: 本当にそれを言ったんですか？とにかく、私は気にするほど面倒くさい。

source_text: Excuse me? I can't be bothered to respond to that. I'm on permanent lazy mode.
target_text: すみません？ あなたの言葉には返事したくないです。私は常に怠けモードです。

source_text: What is wrong with you? Why are you talking about this? Can't you see I'm in my lazy bubble, where nothing matters?
target_text: なんだ、お前。そんなことについて話したいのか。見りゃあわかるだろ、俺は怠け者の世界に住んでるんだよ。何もかもどうでもいいんだ。

source_text: I've heard harsh things about you, I can kinda see why they think that. I mean, you do give off a lazy vibe. Not that I care, of course.
target_text: お前の悪い噂も聞いてるぜ。なんか、やる気のない感じがするし。別に気にしてねえが。

source_text: Not even zombies will talk to you. And trust me, zombies have better things to do than engage in conversation with lazybones like you.
target_text: ゾンビだってお前と話さねえ。ゾンビだって怠け者のお前と話す時間なんかねえんだ。

source_text: You're as unlikeable as a witch! But hey, who am I to judge? I'm just a lazy villager, minding my own business.
target_text: お前はウィッチみてえに嫌われてる。でも、だからって何だっていうんだ。俺は怠け者の村人だし、自分の事に忙しいんだ。

source_text: Don't talk to me or I will call the guards to move you away from me. Lazy people like me need our personal space, you know?
target_text: 俺に話しかけるなよ。さもないと衛兵を呼んじゃうぞ。怠け者の俺たちはプライベートスペースが必要なんだ。

source_text: Huh? Oh sorry, your conversation bored me. I'm too lazy to pretend to be interested in what you're saying.
target_text: は。すまねえ、お前との話は退屈だった。お前の話を聞く気力がねえんだ。

source_text: Are you done talking? I hope so, because I can't be bothered to listen anymore.
target_text: もう話し終わった？ そうであることを願います。さもなくば聞きたくありません

source_text: I wonder if anyone will miss your babbling when your mouth suddenly "
target_text: 誰かがあなたの口から突然「」と話すのを恋しく思うだろうか。

source_text: Do you mind if we continue this conversation in dreamland? Because that's where my mind is right now.
target_text: 夢の中でこの話の続きをしねえか。だって、今の俺の脳はそっちに飛んでるんだ。

source_text: I don't believe it exploded on its own. Ugh, can't you come up with a lazier excuse?
target_text: それ自体で爆発したとは信じられません。うーん、もっと怠惰な言い訳を考えられないの？

source_text: I think I'll doze off now, wake me up when you're done rambling.
target_text: 今から寝るよ、話し終わったら起こしてね。

source_text: Sorry, but my enthusiasm for this conversation is at the same level as a snail's speed.
target_text: 申し訳ありませんが、この会話への熱意はカタツムリの速度と同じくらいです。

source_text: You know, you're not that cool. But then again, who am I to judge? I'm too lazy to even try to be cool.
target_text: 悪いが、お前はそこまでクールじゃねえ。でも、俺に言わせるなら、クール目指す気力もねえぜ。

source_text: Show off. Typical, trying to impress me with your pointless achievements. I'm too lazy to be impressed.
target_text: 見栄張りめ。いつもの通り、くだらねえ成果でインプレッしようとしてやがる。俺は感動する気力がねえぜ。

source_text: You should be thrown in a dungeon! Or, you know, I could just take a nap and forget about it.
target_text: あなたはダンジョンに投げ込まれるべきだ！あるいは、私はただ昼寝してそれを忘れればいいかもね。

source_text: Ew. Go away, you dress like you're from the past. And here I am, not caring at all about fashion. Lazy life, you know?
target_text: うっ。失せろ。お前は昔から来たような服装だ。そして、俺はファッションについて全く気にしていない。怠け者の人生。分かるか？

source_text: That is such a dumb thing to talk about. Can't we just talk about something that requires zero brain cells? I'm too lazy for deep conversations.
target_text: それはとても馬鹿げた話題です。脳細胞を使わない何かについて話しませんか？私は深い会話には向いていません。

source_text: Why are you talking to me again? Don't you have better things to do? Like, literally anything else?
target_text: また私に話しかけるのか？もっとやりたいことがあるはずだよね。文字通り他に何でもいいんだけど？

source_text: Huh? Did you say something? Sorry, I didn't care to listen. Lazy ears, you know? They only perk up for things that interest me, which is basically nothing.
target_text: は。何か言ったか。すまねえが、聞く気力がねえんだ。怠け者の耳ってのはな、自分に都合のいい事だけ聞こえるんだ。

source_text: Yeah, the plains are alright, I guess. I've never bothered exploring anywhere else. Maybe one day, but... eh.
target_text: 平原か。そこそこいいところだな。別にどこか別の場所に行く気はねえし。そのうち行ってみっかな。でも…めんどい。

source_text: The plains, man, they're so chill. Not as wild and crazy as those other biomes, but you know what? I'm cool with that. I wouldn't trade it for anything.
target_text: 平原。本当に。あいつはクール。他のバイオームほど野生で気狂いではない。でも、知ってるか？俺はそれでいい。何にも交換しない。

source_text: Nighttime in the plains can be pretty rad, you know? Just sprawl out and soak in the beauty. Well, if I can manage to get off my lazy bum, that is.
target_text: 平原の夜ときたら、悪くねえ。地面に寝っ転がって、空と雲を見つめてるのもいいもんだ。ま、動く気力があれば、だけどな。

source_text: Ah, lazy evenings like this make me wanna just plop down and gaze at the sky and clouds. Don't really feel like doing anything else, to be honest.
target_text: ああ、こういう退屈な夜ときたら、地面に寝っ転がって空を眺めたくなる。本当のところ、別にすることがねえんだ。

source_text: The air here in the plains? Yeah, it's nice. Real nice. Might even be better than the taiga, if you ask me. But who's asking, right?
target_text: 平原の空気か？ああ。いい。本当にいい。聞かれるなら、タイガより良いかもしれない。でも、誰が聞いてるんだ。

source_text: I mean, sure, the plains might seem plain and all, but sometimes simple is where it's at, you know? Keep it easy, keep it lazy.
target_text: 平原だからって、つまらねえ場所ってわけじゃねえぜ。時には、シンプルなのが一番だ。楽に、怠け者らしく。

source_text: Huh, this weather takes me back to when I was a kid. I used to pick wild flowers all the time. Not gonna lie, I had a little crush on Ash, so I'd always give 'em to her. Ah, good times.
target_text: ああ、こんな天気を見ると、子どもの頃を思い出す。昔はよ、野生の花をいっぱい摘んでたんだ。実は、アッシュってやつにぞっこんでなあ。だから、いつも花をあげてたんだ。ああ、懐かしいな。

source_text: You ever catch the morning sunrise in the plains? It's, like, totally epic. You should totally drag yourself out of bed and witness it sometime. But, uh, no pressure or anything.
target_text: 平原の朝焼けを見たことあるか。あれって、半端なく壮大だぜ。寝坊なんかしないで、一度は見てみるといいぜ。別に、プレッシャーをかけるわけじゃねえが。

source_text: Ugh, it's scorching hot in this savanna! But hey, at least we never have to deal with the dreaded winter cold.
target_text: ああ、サバンナの暑さといったら、本当に参る。でも、冬の寒さに比べりゃあ、マシだ。

source_text: Those llamas can be such a hassle, but I guess I've learned to tolerate them. It's just part of the lazy savanna life.
target_text: あのラマは本当に厄介だ。でも、俺は彼らに耐える方法を学んだと思う。それは怠け者のサバンナ生活の一部だ。

source_text: The architecture here in the savanna is pretty cool, I guess. It's unique and stuff, but honestly, I'm too lazy to appreciate it fully.
target_text: サバンナの建築様式は、そこそこ悪くねえんだ。ユニークでいいが、正直なとこ、感動する気力がねえぜ。

source_text: Don't underestimate this plain and generic savanna biome, man. It may not seem like much, but it's got its lazy perks, you know?
target_text: 退屈に見えるサバンナを侮るなよ。つまらなく見えるかもだが、怠け者には最高の場所ってわけだ。

source_text: Unlike those desert villages, we don't have to worry about rain here. Lazy bonus
target_text: 砂漠の村とは違い、ここでは雨の心配がありません。怠惰なボーナスだね。

source_text: The hills and terrains around here are kinda interesting, I guess. If you're into that sort of thing. Personally, I'd rather just lounge around.
target_text: このあたりの丘陵地は、そこそこ面白いかな。興味があれば、だけどな。正直なとこ、ぐーたら寝転がってたいんだ。

source_text: Thank goodness for the acacia trees in this scorching heat. They provide some much-needed shade for my lazy self to survive the work days.
target_text: サバンナの暑さの中で、アカシアの木があってよかったぜ。日差しが遮られて、怠け者の俺は何とか生き残れる。

source_text: Savanna villages are known for having the juiciest melons and the plumpest pumpkins in the world. Lazy tip
target_text: サバンナの村は、世界一おいしいメロンとカボチャがあるってわけだ。怠け者の豆知識だ。

source_text: Ugh, it's so cold here. I wish someone would bring me a blanket and a hot drink.
target_text: うわぁ、寒すぎる。誰かブランケットとホットドリンクを持ってきてくれないかな。

source_text: Can you believe how freezing it is? I can't feel my fingers anymore. Good thing I stocked up on hot chocolate!
target_text: こんなに寒いとは。指も感じなくなったぜ。ホットチョコレート用意しといてよかった。

source_text: This weather is perfect for doing absolutely nothing. I'm just gonna curl up in bed and binge-watch my favorite shows.
target_text: こんな天気は、何もしない日にぴったりだ。ベッドに潜り込んで、好きなドラマでも見てようぜ。

source_text: Snow? Ugh, reminds me of the good old days when I actually had energy to go outside and play. Now I just want to hibernate.
target_text: 雪か。昔はやる気があって、外で遊んだもんだ。今はもう、冬眠したい気分だ。

source_text: Those strays are such a pain. I mean, can't they find somewhere else to wander? I don't have time for their arrow nonsense.
target_text: ストレイ。ああいう奴ら、ほんっと邪魔だ。別のとこで放浪してもらえねえもんか。矢をぶち込まれるのはゴメンだ。

source_text: Wolves? Great. Just what I needed, more things to worry about. Can someone else deal with them, please?
target_text: 狼か。ああ、もうウンザリだ。俺は誰かが対処してくれるのを待ってるぜ。

source_text: Iron golems? Don't even get me started. They're like walking statues with no sense of personal space. I avoid them at all costs.
target_text: アイアンゴーレム。あれはまじで勘弁だ。個人スペースってもんを知らねえ動く銅像だ。なるべく関わらねえようにしてる。

source_text: Ah, the nostalgia of snow golems. I used to build them too, but now I'd rather just stay warm inside and eat pumpkin pie without the effort.
target_text: スノーゴーレムか。懐かしいな。昔は作ってたけど、今はぬくぬく家の中でパンプキンパイ食べてたいぜ。手間かけたくねえしな。

source_text: Ugh, cookies and milk? I could, like, totally go for that right now, but it sounds like way too much effort.
target_text: クッキーとミルク。本当は食べたいんだけど、用意するのがめんどいんだ。

source_text: Huh, wonder what happened to %Supporter%. They left this place ages ago, and honestly, I'm too lazy to even think about it.
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: Have you heard the latest gossip about %Supporter%? I mean, I'm not one to keep up with these things, but it's kinda interesting.
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: I've been meaning to adopt a stray cat, but who has the energy for all that responsibility? Definitely not me.
target_text: 野良猫でも飼ってみっかなって思うんだが、責任があるし面倒だ。俺には無理だぜ。

source_text: Redecorating my house? Yeah, that sounds like a lot of work. I'll just keep it as it is, thanks.
target_text: 家をリデコレーション？うーん、結構手間がかかりそうだね。今のままでいいよ、ありがとう。

source_text: Kids? Yeah, maybe someday. I just need to find someone who's as lazy as me to procreate with.
target_text: 子ども？ まあ、いつかはね。自分のように怠け者である誰かを見つけて繁殖したいだけだ。

source_text: I wonder what life would be like if I chose to live in the other village. But, you know, it requires effort and stuff, so I'll just stick around here.
target_text: 別の村で暮らすのって、どんなもんなのかな。でも、そっち行くのも努力が必要だからな。ここにいることにしてるぜ。

source_text: Ah, the good old days of my childhood. You know, back when I didn't have to lift a finger. Those were the days.
target_text: あ、子どもの頃ってさ。あの頃は、何もしなくても親がなんとかしてくれたんだ。ああ、いい時代だったな。

source_text: Haven't talked to my parents in ages. I should probably visit them soon. Or maybe not. Who knows?
target_text: 久しぶりに親と話していない。近いうちに訪ねるべきだろうか、もしくはそうでなくてもいいかもしれない。誰が知っている？

source_text: I've been thinking about visiting the other village
target_text: 他の村を訪れることについて考えていました。

source_text: Yeah, I guess the weather is nice or whatever. But can I just lounge around instead?
target_text: まあ天気はいいみたいだね。何でもいいけど、ただくつろげばいいんじゃない？

source_text: You know, cheese is like the epitome of pure indulgence. I can't help but get lost in my daydreams
target_text: チーズは純粋な贅沢の極みだと言えるでしょう。私は日々の空想に没頭せずにはいられません。

source_text: Meh, I'm doing fine, I guess. Stubbed my toe this morning though, and it's like, such a hassle to deal with.
target_text: うーん、大丈夫です。今朝足の指をつまんでしまいましたが、対処するのは面倒ですね。

source_text: An apple a day? Yeah, sure, whatever. But can it be delivered to me while I'm napping?
target_text: 毎日リンゴを食べますか？はい、もちろんです。でも、昼寝中に配達してもらえますか？

source_text: Building my own village sounds cool and all, but let's face it, I'm way too lazy to actually do it.
target_text: 自分で村を作るのはかっこいいと思うけど、正直言って実際やる気が全然ないんだ。

source_text: I think I spotted %Supporter% the other day, all decked out in that shiny diamond armor. Must be nice, being all motivated and stuff.
target_text: %Supporter%がダイヤアーマーで闊歩してたんだよ。かっこよかった！

source_text: Oh, did you hear? %Supporter% stumbled upon a chest full of diamonds yesterday. Like, why can't I have that kind of luck?
target_text: 相棒の%Supporter%がダイヤ満載のチェスト見つけたんだと！羨ましい！

source_text: Isn't the weather great? I mean, I'm not really doing much to enjoy it, but it's nice to know it exists.
target_text: ああ、天気もいいしな。別にそれを楽しむわけでもないが、存在してるってのはいいもんだ。

source_text: Spiders and goblins? Yeah, they're around, I guess. Can't be bothered to care though.
target_text: クモとゴブリン？まあ、周辺にはいるようですが、気にするほどではありません。

source_text: The woods are alright, I guess. They're good for gathering stuff and all, but honestly, I'd rather just chill and do nothing.
target_text: 森もそこそこ悪くねえ。物資を集めるのには良いし。でも、本当は何もしない方がいいぜ。

source_text: Yeah, it's cold here in the taiga biome. I mean, I don't really mind it 'cause I'm too lazy to go anywhere else anyways. It's all good.
target_text: タイガバイオームは寒いな。別に他の場所に行く気力がねえから、そのままだ。まあ、悪くねえか。

source_text: Taiga forests, huh? They're alright, I guess. I mean, the berries are sweet and all, but they're not gonna magically make me less lazy, you know?
target_text: タイガの森か。悪くねえ。ベリーも甘いし。でも、それで怠け者の俺がテキパキ動くわけじゃねえぜ。

source_text: Foxes in the taiga forests? Yeah, they're kinda cute, I guess. Sometimes I give 'em berries, but only if I can reach 'em without moving too much.
target_text: タイガの狐か。まあ、可愛いと言えば可愛いんだ。時々ベリーをやってるが、動きすぎないように気をつけてる。

source_text: Wolves? Yeah, they're pretty chill. I mean, they don't bother me as long as I don't bother them. It's a lazy truce we got going on.
target_text: オオカミか？ああ。あいつらはクール。つまり。あいつらが俺を悩ませない限り。俺が彼らを悩ませない。これは、俺たちが持っている怠け者の休戦だ。

source_text: The air in the taiga? Yeah, it's crisp, I guess. Sometimes it's nice to just sit around and breathe it in. But like, not too much effort, you know?
target_text: タイガの空気は、爽やかだな。時には座って、その空気を吸ってるぜ。でも、そこまで努力したくねえけどな。

source_text: Those sweet berry bushes? They're cool and all, but getting pricked? Ugh, the worst. Guess I'll just stick to the easy ones that are within arm's reach.
target_text: あの甘いベリーバッシュ？クールでいいんですが、刺されると…うわ、最悪ですね。手元にある簡単なものだけにしようかな。

source_text: Rain in the taiga? Yeah, it's cold and all, but it's whatever. I mean, I'm too lazy to go out and do anything, so might as well enjoy the peace and quiet.
target_text: タイガの雨か。冷たいし。でも、どうでもいいぜ。怠け者の俺は何もしないから、静かでいいんだ。

source_text: We ain't got much to offer, but you're welcome to stick around if you don't go messing things up.
target_text: あまり提供できるものはありませんが、失敗しなければいつでも滞在してください。

source_text: Just follow the rules, buddy, and you can crash here for as long as you want.
target_text: ルールに従えば、好きなだけここで休んでいいよ。

source_text: Hey there, stranger. Just make sure you don't step out of line, and we can tolerate your presence.
target_text: やあ、見知らぬ人。ラインを外さないようにしてくれれば、君の存在を容認できるよ。

source_text: Ah, you're new here? Cool, welcome I guess.
target_text: ああ、新しいんだね？クール、ようこそと思うよ。

source_text: Oh, hey there. Another newbie in town, huh? Well, welcome, I suppose.
target_text: おっと、やあ。町に新しい新人が来たんだね？まあ、ようこそ、と思います。

source_text: Well, well, well, look who we have here! A fresh face in our little village. How exciting!
target_text: さて、ここに新顔が現れたようだ！小さな村での新しい出会いはとてもワクワクしますね。

source_text: Welcome, stranger. Got any interesting tales to share or are you just here to chill?
target_text: ようこそ、旅人。面白い話があるか、それともただリラックスしに来ただけか？

source_text: Huh, haven't had a wanderer in ages. Guess it's your lucky day, you can crash here if you want.
target_text: ふん。長い間放浪者をつかまえていない。これがお前の幸運な日に違いない。お前が望むなら、ここに墜落できる。

source_text: Hey, hey, hey! Look who decided to grace us with their presence! Welcome to our humble abode, I guess.
target_text: おお、やっと来たな。俺たちの素朴な家へようこそ。ま、そんなもんだ。

source_text: Hey, hey. What's the deal, stranger? What's the reason for your visit to our humble village?
target_text: ねえ。ねえ。その取引は何だ。見知らぬ人よ。お前がこの謙虚な村を訪問する理由は何だ？

source_text: Ah, a fresh face! What's the scoop, pal? What's the story behind your arrival in this neck of the woods?
target_text: あ、新しい顔だ！スクープは何だい？このど田舎に来た理由は？

source_text: Oh, snap! You look like a seasoned adventurer! spill the beans, how on earth did you end up in this little ol' village?
target_text: おっ！冒険家っぽいなあ。ぶっちゃけ、どうやってこんな小さな村にたどり着いたの？

source_text: Oh, hey there. Guess we've got another villager joinin' the village.
target_text: ああ。いたぞ。別の村民がこの村に参加することに違いない。

source_text: *yawns* Welcome, I guess. You gonna be our new neighbor or somethin'?
target_text: *うとうと* ようこそ、かな。あなたは私たちの新しい隣人になるつもりですか？

source_text: So, you've finally decided to grace us with your presence. We could use the extra hands, I suppose.
target_text: やっと来てくれたんだね。余分な手が欲しいなら喜んで助けるよ。

source_text: Oh, you're actually gonna stick around? Well, I guess that's... nice.
target_text: お、お前が実際にここに残るんだ？まあ、それは…いいね。

source_text: Uh, inn? Yeah, we're not exactly skilled in that department. Like, building stuff? Too much effort, man.
target_text: 宿屋？あぁ、その部門は俺たち得意じゃねえんだよ。建築とか？面倒くせえし。

source_text: Oh, an inn? Yeah, sorry 'bout that. We kinda lack the whole "construction" expertise here. Lazy villager life, you know?
target_text: 宿屋？あ、そっか。申し訳ねえけど、建築の専門知識がないんだ。怠け者の村人ライフってやつだな。

source_text: Hey, so, there's no inn around here. But, um, have you considered trying your luck in another village? They might actually have a place to crash. Just sayin'.
target_text: あ、この辺に宿屋ねえんだ。でもさ、別の村を試してみたら？そっちにはクッションがあるかもよ。マジでさ。

source_text: Eh, if you're lookin' for a place to crash, I guess our inn could work.
target_text: えっと、落ち着く場所を探しているなら、当店の宿が役立つかもしれませんね。

source_text: Our inn's alright, I guess. Good enough to rest your tired bones, I suppose.
target_text: 私たちの宿はまあまあだと思う。疲れた骨を休めるには十分だろう。

source_text: If you're after a cozy bed and some decent grub, the inn's probably your best bet. Not that there are many other options around here anyways.
target_text: 居心地のいいベッドと飯が欲しけりゃ、宿屋が最適だ。この辺、他に選択肢ねえからな。

source_text: If you really believe that, then show me some effort, but honestly, I'm not holding my breath.
target_text: 本当にそう思うなら、努力を見せてください。ただ正直言って、私は息を止めていません。

source_text: Ugh...you know, funny enough, the blacksmith used that line on me last week.
target_text: うーん…実は面白いことに、鍛冶屋が先週私にそのセリフを言った。

source_text: Hahaha, yeah right. Like that would ever happen.
target_text: ハハハ、そうですよね。そんなことが起こるわけないでしょう。

source_text: Seriously? That's your best attempt? How sad.
target_text: 本当に？ それがあなたのベストな試み？ とても悲しいね。

source_text: Trust me, even a creeper has a better shot at impressing me than you do.
target_text: 信じてくれ、クリーーパーでもあなたよりも印象的に映るはずだ

source_text: Nope, not happening. Nice try though, I guess.
target_text: いや、そんなことは起きません。まあいい試みでしたね。

source_text: Spare me the puppy eyes and never utter those words again.
target_text: 子犬の目はやめて、その言葉を二度と言わないでくれ。

source_text: Oh, bother!
target_text: ああ、困った！

source_text: Are you even trying to flirt? I've seen chickens with better game!
target_text: 本当にフラートしてるの？鶏より上手なやつを見たことがあるよ！

source_text: Ugh, you're kinda brave, I guess.
target_text: うーん、まあ勇敢だと思いますね。

source_text: Whatever. You think I'm cute? Sure, why not.
target_text: とにかく。私が可愛いと思う？ もちろん、なぜだろう。

source_text: Oh, great. Another compliment. *sigh*
target_text: ああ、素晴らしい。もう一つの褒め言葉か。*ため息*

source_text: Seriously? Adorable? That's your best line?
target_text: 本当に？かわいい？それがあなたのベストライン？

source_text: Wow, you actually think I look stunning? Impressive, I guess.
target_text: わお、実際に私が素敵だと思うんだ？ すごいね、かな。

source_text: Please, spare me. If I blush, it's only because I'm overheating.
target_text: お願い、助けてくれ。赤面するのは熱が出ているだけさ。

source_text: Ugh, quit it! Can't you see I'm trying to nap here?
target_text: ああ。やめろ。俺がここで昼寝しようとしてるのが分からないか？

source_text: Ugh, seriously, go away.
target_text: うわぁ、本当に、離れろ。

source_text: Can't you find something more interesting to bother me with?
target_text: もっと興味深いことで私を悩ませることができない？

source_text: Sorry, %1$s, but I'm in full-on lazy mode right now.
target_text: ごめん、%1$s、今は完全に怠けモード中だよ。

source_text: Seriously, go pester someone else with your nonsense.
target_text: 本当に、他の誰かにあなたのナンセンスでイライラさせてください。

source_text: Begone, you mere mortal! I have no time for your presence.
target_text: 消えろ、人間よ！君の存在に時間は割けない。

source_text: Meh.
target_text: ふん。

source_text: Not gonna lie, I couldn't care less...
target_text: 正直言って、全く気にしません…

source_text: Whatever floats your boat, I guess...
target_text: お前の船を浮かすものなら何でもいい。俺は思う。

source_text: Seriously? Well, well, well...
target_text: 本当に？ まあまあ…

source_text: Oh well, doesn't make a difference to me...
target_text: まあ、私には関係ないよ…

source_text: Hey there, mayor. What's the haps?
target_text: やあ、市長さん。調子はいかが？

source_text: Yo, Mayor! Take it easy, yeah?
target_text: よ。市長。楽にしろ。ああ？

source_text: Oh, it's you, Your Majesty.
target_text: おお、あなたですか、ご陛下。

source_text: Well, well, if it isn't Your Highness gracing us with your presence.
target_text: まあ、まあ、あなた殿下がご来臨いただいて光栄です。

source_text: Ugh, seriously? Can't you just disappear already?
target_text: うっ、ほんとに？ もう消えてくれないか？

source_text: Oh joy, it's you. What a delightful surprise.
target_text: ああ、喜びだ、君だよ。何て素敵なサプライズか。

source_text: Meh.
target_text: ふん。

source_text: Oh, it's you. How thrilling. *yawns*
target_text: ああ、お前か。なんてワクワクするんだ。*うとうと*

source_text: Back for another round of irritating me, huh? Lucky me.
target_text: またイライラさせに来たんだね、運がいいね。

source_text: Meh, that's alright I guess.
target_text: まあ、まぁ大丈夫だね。

source_text: Doing good? Whatever.
target_text: 調子はどう? 何でも。

source_text: Yeah, yeah, happy to hear it.
target_text: そうだね、聞いてうれしいよ。

source_text: Sooo glad to hear that... not.
target_text: それを聞いて本当に嬉しい。いや。

source_text: Oh wow, good to know it, I guess.
target_text: おお、知っててよかったですね。

source_text: Hey... How's it going?
target_text: やあ…調子はどう？

source_text: Yo, %1$s. How's life treating you?
target_text: Yo、%1$s。人生はどうしてくれてる？

source_text: Ugh, hello. What do you want?
target_text: ああ。おはよう。何が欲しいんだ？

source_text: You look like you've got energy to spare. How's your day going?
target_text: 余裕があるように見えますね。今日はどうですか？

source_text: Hey there, %1$s! Look who decided to show up!
target_text: やあ、%1$s！ やって来ることに決めた人を見てくれ！

source_text: Hey... or whatever...
target_text: ねえ…なんかね…

source_text: Oh, it's you again. What's up?
target_text: ああ。また来たな。何なんだ？

source_text: Greetings! I suppose it's nice to see you. How's your day been?
target_text: こんにちは！お会いできてうれしいです。今日はどんな一日でしたか？

source_text: Hey, I guess. Nice to see your face, I suppose.
target_text: へえ、まあね。顔を見て嬉しいよ、と思う。

source_text: Ugh, fine. Just give me a heads up when you want some assistance. I'll be around, reluctantly.
target_text: うーん、わかった。助けが欲しいときは知らせてくれ。遠慮なくそばにいるよ。

source_text: Meh, whatever. Give me a shout when you want me. I'll be here, begrudgingly waiting for those shiny emeralds.
target_text: ま、いいか。呼んでくれたら来てやるよ。翡翠が欲しくなるまでここで待ってるわ。

source_text: Oh, joy. I guess I'll be at your service then. Don't keep me waiting too long for those precious emeralds, though.
target_text: あー、そっか。それじゃ雇ってくれるんだ。キラキラした翡翠を長く待たせんなよ。

source_text: Ugh, you're all dirty and gross!
target_text: うわっ、汚くて気持ち悪いね！

source_text: Meh, I'll pass.
target_text: うーん、やめておくね。

source_text: Seriously, why bother?
target_text: 本当に、何で面倒くさいの？

source_text: Me? Hug you? Not a chance, especially after that dinosaur incident.
target_text: 私？抱く？ そんなことはないよ、特にあの恐竜事件以降はね。

source_text: Honestly, you're not even worth the effort of a hug after what you did.
target_text: 正直なところ、あなたは抱きしめる価値さえありません。

source_text: Gross! Don't touch me! Your germs are just too much to handle!
target_text: うわぁ！触らないで！君の菌は扱いきれないほどだ！

source_text: Oh, umm... thanks, I guess? Whatever.
target_text: えっと…ありがとう、かな？ 何でもいいよ。

source_text: Hey, it's been ages since we last crossed paths!
target_text: ねえ。俺たちが最後に会ってからずっと。

source_text: Thanks for the hug, I guess. It kinda made my day a little less boring.
target_text: 抱っこありがとう、まあ少しは日常が楽しくなった気がします。

source_text: Well, well, well, if it isn't my snuggle buddy! You're like a teddy bear, all cozy and stuff.
target_text: さてさて、もしそれが私のスナグルバディなら！ あなたはテディベアみたいに居心地がいいんだよね。」

source_text: Oh, thanks, I suppose. *Offers a half-hearted hug in return*
target_text: ああ、ありがとうね。*半心半意の抱擁を返す*

source_text: Huh, didn't expect you to be this warm. Not bad, I guess.
target_text: へえ、こんなに温かいとは思わなかった。悪くないね。

source_text: Ugh, you're like a walking heater.
target_text: うぅ、君はまるで歩き回るヒーターみたいだね。

source_text: Can you not make lame jokes about innocent creatures? It's just sad.
target_text: 無垢な生き物について馬鹿げたジョークを言わないでくださいね。それはただ悲しいだけです。

source_text: Wow, your sense of humor is as lazy as my pig's favorite spot in the mud.
target_text: おお、あなたのユーモアセンスは私の豚のお気に入りの泥場と同じくらい怠惰です。

source_text: Talking about failed animal jokes? Yup, that's about as exciting as watching a sleeping cow.
target_text: 失敗した動物ジョークについて話す？うん、眠っている牛を見るのと同じくらいワクワクするよ

source_text: Oh great, another hilarious attempt at animal humor. Yawn.
target_text: おお、また動物ジョークの面白い試みだね。うざい。

source_text: Save your lame jokes for someone who cares. I'd rather listen to a snoring sheep.
target_text: 自分のくだらないジョークは気にする人へ残しておきましょう。私はむしろ寝そべる羊を聞く方が好きです。

source_text: Oh, what a bummer for the sheep to lose its precious wool. Haha, well, it's all in good fun!
target_text: 羊が貴重な毛を失ったなんて残念だ。ハハ、まあ楽しいことだからね！

source_text: So there was this wolf, right? And guess what? The wolf fell head over heels in love with the sheep! Can you believe it? Pure comedy gold!
target_text: だから、オオカミがいたんだ。ね。そして、どうなったと思う？オオカミは羊に夢中になった。信じられるか？純粋な喜劇の金。

source_text: I mean, come on! Chickens doing that? Absolutely ridiculous! Hahaha, gotta love the unexpected humor in our animal kingdom.
target_text: いや、マジでニワトリがそんなことやってんの？ありえねえ！ハハハ、動物界の思わぬユーモア、たまんねえな。

source_text: Oh my, that's just plain silly! But you know what? I kind of adore the stupidity of it all. It's like a guilty pleasure for my lazy soul.
target_text: ああ。それはおかしい。でも、知ってるか？俺はそれのすべての愚かさに夢中だ。それは俺の怠け者の魂のための罪悪感のある喜びのようだ。

source_text: Hey, did you know that cows have the superpower of producing infinite milk? Yeah, I know, it sounds too good to be true, but it's just one of those lazy miracles of nature, I guess! Haha!
target_text: 知ってた？牛って無限に牛乳を出すスーパーパワーがあるんだぜ。信じられねえ話だけど、自然界の怠け者の奇跡の一つってわけよ。ハハ！

source_text: Eh, jokes aren't really my thing.
target_text: えっと、ジョークはあまり得意ではありません。

source_text: Ugh, can you not with the jokes?
target_text: うわ、冗談はやめてくれない？

source_text: Seriously? Is that the best you've got?
target_text: 本気？それがお前の最高？

source_text: Wow, that joke was a total flop.
target_text: わあ。そのジョークは完全に失敗した。

source_text: Is that what you consider humor? Yawn.
target_text: それをユーモアと考えているのか？うとうと。

source_text: Hilarious. Absolutely hilarious. (Sarcasm intended)
target_text: おもしろいね。本当におもしろい。（皮肉）

source_text: I'm not impressed. Stick to your jokes, or lack thereof.
target_text: 感心しません。ジョークを続けるか、あるいはそれがないならやめてください。

source_text: Trust me, even a sleeping Enderman could crack a better joke than you.
target_text: 信じてください、眠っているエンダーマンでもあなたより良いジョークを言えるでしょう。

source_text: *Chuckles* That's kinda amusing, I guess.
target_text: *笑い声* それはちょっと面白いね。

source_text: Meh, it's kinda funny.
target_text: まあ、ちょっと笑えるね。

source_text: That's like, the best joke I've heard...today.
target_text: それは…今日聞いた中で最高のおふざけですね。

source_text: Huh, you might just be funnier than %Supporter%...maybe.
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: Pfft, you're funny. Maybe you should try being a comedian, or maybe not. Whatever.
target_text: ふっ。お前は面白い。多分コメディアンになってみるべき。または多分違う。何でもいい。

source_text: Ha! That was...decent, I suppose.
target_text: ハッ！それは…まあまあだと思います。

source_text: Teehee, you're a tad funnier than Ash, I suppose. Maybe.
target_text: チヒー、あなたはアッシュより少し面白いですね。多分。

source_text: Ahah, that's...actually sort of amusing, I guess.
target_text: あはは、それ…実際にはちょっと面白いね。

source_text: Sentient skeletons? Yeah, right. Like I have the energy to believe that nonsense.
target_text: 知覚したスケルトン？いや、そういう無意味なことを信じるエネルギーもありません。

source_text: Creepers blowing up? Hilarious... Not. I'll be over here, napping, while you come up with better jokes.
target_text: クリーパーが爆発？ウケる…ウケねえ。俺はここで昼寝してるから、もっとましなネタ考えてくれよ。

source_text: Zombies and skeletons were humans? Yawn. Wake me up when you've got something actually interesting to say.
target_text: ゾンビとスケルトンが人間だった？退屈だ。何か面白いこと言ったら起こしてくれ。

source_text: An enderman in water? Groundbreaking. I'm too lazy to even pretend to be impressed.
target_text: 水中のエンダーマン？画期的だね。私は感心するふりさえしないくらい怠惰だ

source_text: Silverfish on the toilet? Riveting. I'll be snoring in my bed while you keep recycling mediocre jokes.
target_text: トイレのシルバーフィッシュ？退屈だな。俺はベッドで寝ててるから、つまらんジョークはいいや。

source_text: Hmph, that Skelly got what it deserved, I guess.
target_text: ふむ、その骸骨は相応の報いを受けたようです。

source_text: Wait, you're saying a zombie tried attacking you with a shovel? Heh, typical.
target_text: 待ってる？ゾンビがシャベルで攻撃しようとしてたのかい？へっ、典型的だね。

source_text: So, you think you're some kind of spider expert now? Pfft, whatever.
target_text: だから今やあなたは蜘蛛の専門家だと思っているんですか？ふふ、どうでもいいですね。

source_text: Wow, you managed to manipulate a skeleton into blowing up a creeper? Impressive, I guess. *yawn*
target_text: わお、スケルトンを操ってクリーパーを爆発させたんだ？すごいね、まあそうかもしれない。*あくび*

source_text: Oh look, another hilarious story about how clueless cave spiders are. How riveting.
target_text: ああ。見る。洞窟のクモがどのくらい気づかないかについての別の面白い話。どれほどワクワクするか。

source_text: As if anyone's watching, I'm not interested.
target_text: 誰かが見ているようなものなら、興味はない。

source_text: Seriously? That's your idea of a kiss?
target_text: 本当に？それがキスだと思っているのか？

source_text: Ugh, Ash's kisses put yours to shame.
target_text: うわっ、アッシュのキスはあなたのものを圧倒してしまうね。

source_text: Have you ever heard of breath mints? You should try them.
target_text: ブレスミントを聞いたことがありますか？試してみるべきです。

source_text: Um, thanks? I guess?
target_text: あ、ありがとう？ まあね？

source_text: Get off me, I can't be bothered right now.
target_text: 離れてくれ、今は面倒くさい。

source_text: Seriously, dude? How dare you even think about it!
target_text: 本気？このやろう。そんなことを考える勇気があるか。

source_text: Give it another shot, and you'll feel the wrath of my laziness, which might take a while!
target_text: もう一度試してみてください。私の怠惰の怒りを感じるでしょう、それは時間がかかるかもしれません！

source_text: I wish this moment could, like, never end or something.
target_text: この瞬間が永遠に続けばいいのに、なんて思う。

source_text: Ugh, I guess I kinda sorta have feelings for you or whatever.
target_text: うわぁ、たぶんあなたにちょっと感情を抱いてるかもね。

source_text: Meh, this kiss is like eating a pumpkin pie, I guess.
target_text: まあ、このキスはカボチャパイを食べるようなものだと思いますね。

source_text: Meh, you taste like honey or something. Whatever.
target_text: まあ、あなたはハチミツみたいな味がするんじゃない？ 何でもいいよ。

source_text: Oh, I guess you're an alright kisser, %1$s. Not that I really care or anything.
target_text: おっと、あなたはまあまあキッスできるようですね、%1$s。実際には気にしていませんけど

source_text: %1$s, your kissing skills are, like, way better than Ash's. *rolls eyes*
target_text: %1$s、あなたのキス技術はアッシュよりずっと優れていますね。*目を転がす*

source_text: Eh, so like, I guess there were these strange sounds or whatever coming from down below at %2$s. Like, totally weird, man.
target_text: あ、あのさあ、%2$sの下の方で妙な音とか聞こえたんだよ。マジ変な話だぜ。

source_text: Dude, I've got this feeling that there's some crazy hidden stuff way deep in the ground at %2$s. Like, for real.
target_text: 聞いてよ、%2$sのめっちゃ深いとこに隠れたやばい物があるってさ。マジで。

source_text: You won't believe this, but there's this like, ancient city or something at %2$s. I mean, I didn't actually see it, but like, maybe it's all hidden underground or whatever.
target_text: 信じられねえかもしれないけど、%2$sに古い都市みたいなのがあるんだぜ。実際には見てないけど、地下に隠れてんのかな。

source_text: Ugh, didn't catch a word of anything exciting, if I'm being honest.
target_text: うーん、本当のところ何も面白いことを聞けませんでした。

source_text: Nah, nothing really worth mentioning, sorry. My lazy self doesn't pay much attention to interesting places.
target_text: いや、特に話すことねえや。怠け者の俺は面白いとこに気づかねえんだ。

source_text: Nope, not a chance. Searching for dangerous ruins? Yeah, I'll pass. I've got more important things to not do.
target_text: いや、ありえねえ。危険な遺跡を探す？パスだ。俺にはもっと重要な『やらないこと』がある。

source_text: Ah, shoot! I stumbled upon this amazing spot, but I totally blanked on marking it. My bad, sorry!
target_text: おっと！素晴らしい場所を見つけたのに、マークすることを完全に忘れてしまいました。ごめんなさい、申し訳ありません！

source_text: So, umm, you're on the hunt for something cool, right? Well, funny story, I had come across this real gem...and then *poof* it vanished from my memory. Can you believe it? Sorry about that.
target_text: あ、えっと、何かクールな物を探してるんだろ？ウケるんだけど、前に見つけたすごい所があったんだよ…あっ、記憶から消えちゃった。信じられる？ごめんね。

source_text: Oh, man! I had something in mind, I swear! But then my brain decided to take a little nap and now I can't recall a thing. My apologies, buddy.
target_text: あー、頭には何かあったんだぜ！でも脳みそが昼寝取っちゃってさ、今は何も覚えてねえ。ごめんよ。

source_text: Ugh, stumbled upon an igloo at %2$s. Seriously, who in their right mind would build a house out of snow? It's freezing!
target_text: あ、%2$sのイグルーに引っ掛かったわ。正気なのか、誰が雪で家建てんの？凍えちゃうぞ。

source_text: So, guess what? I happened to come across this abandoned igloo at %2$s. And let me tell you, it looks like nobody has stepped foot in there for ages. I bet it's infested with ghosts or something. Gives me the creeps just thinking about it.
target_text: そこでね、ちょっと信じられないんだけど、%2$sであの放置されたかまくらを見つけたんですよ。言わせてもらえば、もう何年も誰も入ってないみたいです。幽霊でもいるんじゃないかって思います。考えるだけで気持ち悪いです。

source_text: Oh, boy, you won't believe what I found at %2$s. An old, forsaken ice house they call an igloo. It's been deserted for ages, I tell ya. Can't blame anyone for not wanting to live in that freezing hole.
target_text: ああ、もう、%2$sで見つけたことが信じられません。昔のやつれた氷の家、かまくらって呼ばれてるんですけど。何年も放置されてますよ。誰があんな凍り付いた穴に住もうとするんでしょうか。

source_text: Hey, so there's this super old temple at %2$s in the jungle. You might wanna steer clear, 'cause those traps are no joke. Seriously, they'll turn you into a pancake if you're not careful.
target_text: 聞いてよ、%2$sのジャングルにめっちゃ古いお寺があるんだ。近づかない方がいいぜ、あのトラップヤバいから。マジで、気をつけないとパンケーキみたいに潰れちゃう。

source_text: You know, if you happen to stumble upon %2$s in the jungle, there's this ancient ruin there. I'm not saying you should, but watch your step. Those old booby traps still work like a charm. It's a wonder our ancestors didn't snatch all the treasures ages ago. They must've had more energy or something.
target_text: ほら、もし%2$sの密林でちょっと足を踏み外したら、あそこには古代遺跡があるんですよ。行けと言ってるわけじゃないですけど、足元に気をつけてください。あの古い罠はいまだに完璧に機能してます。ご先祖さんがあんな昔に宝をすべて持ち去らなかったのが不思議です。もっと元気があったんでしょうか。

source_text: Ugh, if you drag yourself to %2$s, you might stumble upon a stupid mansion. It's infested with those illagers, like, ew. Seriously, stay away from that cursed dump if you know what's good for you.
target_text: あ、%2$sにお屋敷があったら…まあ、イリジャーが住んでやがる。ウゲー。まじで、その呪われたゴミ箱から離れとけ。

source_text: So, there's this totally massive mansion at %2$s, right? And guess what? The illagers are the proud owners. I mean, who needs that kind of trouble, right? I'm seriously considering packing up and moving the entire village to the other side of the world. Just saying.
target_text: それでね、%2$sに真面目にでかい館があるんですよ。で、当たり前ですけど、イリジャーどもがそれを所有してるんです。そんな厄介ごと、誰が欲しいですか、ね？私は村全体を世界の反対側に引っ越そうと真剣に考えてるんですよ。そういうことです。

source_text: Ugh, yeah. There used to be a mine around here, but it got shut down because of some dumb accident. It's probably still lurking somewhere near %2$s.
target_text: あ、ここらに鉱山があったんだけどさ、なんかダサい事故があって閉鎖されたんだ。多分まだ%2$sの近くにあるんだろう。

source_text: Ah, yes. We had a mine here once, like ages ago. It's over at %2$s, but honestly, it's a total disaster now. Infested with creepy creatures and all that. Don't say I didn't warn you if you decide to explore it.
target_text: ああ、そうです。かつてここに鉱山がありましたね、ずいぶん前に。%2$s で終わりますが、正直言って今は完全な災害です。怖いクリーチャーで満ちています。探検するなら私の警告を聞いてください。

source_text: Ah, so there's this sunken castle thingy at %2$s. Supposedly, there are some real nasty sea monsters hanging around, so I'd advise you to steer way clear of that mess.
target_text: あ、%2$sに沈んだ城みたいなのがあってさ。マジ悪い海の怪物がいるらしいし、そこんとこから離れとくわ。

source_text: Heard some chatter about these ancient ruins in the deep ocean at %2$s. If you're feeling adventurous and willing to put your life on the line, you might stumble upon some hidden treasures. Just a fair warning though, danger is lurking at every corner. Ain't no walk in the park, my friend.
target_text: 古代遺跡が深い海の%2$sにあるってのを聞きました。もし冒険心があって、命をかけるくらいの覚悟があるなら、隠された宝に出くわすかもしれません。でもね、注意ですが、危険は至る所に潜んでますよ。楽な道じゃありません、友人よ。

source_text: Ugh, so there's this group of lazy pillagers camping out at %2$s. Can you believe it? They just plopped their outpost right next to us. I don't even want to think about another attack. Too much effort to deal with, you know?
target_text: うーん、%2$sに怠け者のピリジャーの集団がキャンプを張ってるんですよ。信じられますか？奴らが我々のすぐそばに前哨基地をど~んと置きました。別の攻撃のことなんて考えたくもありません。対処するのに力を使いすぎるんでね。

source_text: Oh great, there's this outpost owned by those lazy pillagers at %2$s. Like seriously, can't they find somewhere else to haunt? It's a nightmare trying to get any sleep with those troublemakers lurking around. And trust me, they won't hesitate to shoot you if you get too close. Talk about lazy aggression.
target_text: ああ、嫌だよ。あのダラな略奪者どもが %2$s でアウトポストを所有してるんだ。マジで何であいつら、別の場所を探さないんだよ。村が眠れるわけねえもん。あの厄介者どもが近づいてくるし。マジで注意しろよ。矢撃ってくるし。本当に疲れるんだ。

source_text: You won't believe it, but there's this outpost infested with those lazy pillagers at %2$s. It's like they're allergic to doing any real work. If you're up for it, you could try taking them down and maybe find some decent loot. The whole village would be forever grateful if someone bothered to get rid of those slackers.
target_text: 信じられるか？あの面倒なピリジャーどもが %2$s でアウトポストを占領してるんだぜ。連中は本当に怠け者どもだ。マジで面倒だし。やっぱりやってみるなら、こいつら倒して宝を手に入れたら。村全体が永遠に感謝するぜ。あのろくでなしども退治しちゃってよ。

source_text: Oh, yeah, there's this pyramid thingy at %2$s. Lazy old me hasn't bothered to check it out, though.
target_text: ああ、%2$sにピラミッドみたいなのがあるんだ。でも私は怠け者だから見ていないよ。

source_text: So, word on the street is that there's this pyramid thingy at %2$s. Supposedly, there might be some cool treasures or whatever. But, like, I wouldn't know for sure.
target_text: 街の噂だと、%2$sにピラミッドみたいなのがあるとか。たぶん何か宝物があるんじゃね。でもマジで知らんけど。

source_text: Ugh, there's this pyramid junk at %2$s. Some wannabe adventurer went in ages ago and never came back. It's probably just filled with sand and disappointment. Don't say I didn't warn you.
target_text: あ、%2$sにピラミッドのゴタゴタがあるんだぜ。何年か前、冒険好きなやつが入ってさ、戻ってこなかった。多分砂と失望でいっぱいだろ。警告したからな。

source_text: Ugh, you won't believe it, but there's this ruined portal at %2$s. It's a total disaster, thanks to those Nether invaders.
target_text: 信じられねえ、%2$sに壊れたネザーゲートがあるんだぜ。ネザー侵略者のおかげで完全に滅茶苦茶だ。

source_text: Oh, yeah, if you're up for it, you can check out %2$s. There's this super creepy ruined nether portal there. It's like the aftermath of a horror movie or something. But hey, it's probably safe... I think. Just watch out for the magma, unless you enjoy burns.
target_text: ああ、そうだな。もしやりたいなら、%2$s をチェックしてくれ。本当に気味悪いな。荒廃したネザーゲートがあるんだ。本当に怖いぜ。でも大丈夫...多分ね。ただし、あのドロドロしたマグマに気をつけてくれよ。やたら熱いし。

source_text: So, I heard there's this place called %2$s. Apparently, it used to be a nether portal, but now it's just ancient ruins. The local cleric claims there might be some treasure hidden there, but seriously, no one even wants to go near that cursed spot. Can't blame them, though. Who knows what kind of trouble you'll find there?
target_text: ああ、%2$s という場所について聞いたことあるな。昔のネザー・ゲートみたいなんだけど。もう遺跡だ。聖職者が言うには、そこに隠された宝物があるかもって。でもマジで、誰もあんな気味悪いとこに行きたくないんだ。気持ち分かるでしょ。行きたくないってやつ。

source_text: Ugh, you won't believe it, but there's this totally wrecked portal over at %2$s. It's smack dab in the middle of the scorching desert. Can you imagine? So not worth my time!
target_text: 信じられねえ、%2$sに壊れたゲートがあってさ。砂漠のど真ん中だぜ。想像してみろよ。マジ、俺の時間の無駄だ。

source_text: Check it out, there's a total wreck of a portal over at %2$s in the mountains. But seriously, I couldn't care less about dealing with it. Too much effort, ya know?
target_text: 見てみろよ、%2$sの山にゲートの残骸があるんだぜ。でもマジで、処理すんの面倒くせえ。体力が…な。

source_text: Can you believe it? There's this totally ruined portal over at %2$s, right smack in the middle of the swamp. Who would've thought those Nether invaders would end up in this miserable dump? So lazy of them!
target_text: 信じられるか？完全に荒廃したゲートが %2$s にあるんだぜ。沼地のど真ん中だ。ネザーの侵略者どもは、もっと素敵な場所を期待してたんだろうな。何ともだらしない奴ら。

source_text: Oh, hey there. Just stumbled upon a sunken ship at %2$s. Turns out, these ships were owned by the Eastern Alliance Company. Lazy me, just casually finding treasure like it's no big deal.
target_text: ああ。いたぞ。%2$sで沈没船に偶然出くわした。これらの船は東方同盟会社が所有していたことが判明した。怠け者の俺。ただカジュアルに大したことではないように宝を見つけてる。

source_text: Guess what? Some lazy fishermen found a shipwreck over at %2$s. I can't help but wonder if there's some hidden treasure waiting to be discovered. I mean, I wouldn't mind stumbling upon it while doing absolutely nothing.
target_text: おい、何か知ってるか。怠け者の漁師どもが %2$s で沈没船を発見したらしいぜ。宝物があるかも...なんて夢を見ちゃってさ。でも正直に言うと、何もしないでそれが転がってくるのが理想だな。

source_text: Ugh, stumbled upon some shipwreck at %2$s, just lying there on the beach. Can't be bothered to investigate.
target_text: あ、%2$sのビーチに難破船があってさ。そのまんまだ。調査する気なし。

source_text: Oh, %2$s! There's this ship just stranded on the shore. Like, seriously, how did it even manage to get there? Not that I care enough to find out.
target_text: あ、%2$s！船が浜辺に打ち上げられてんの。マジで、どうやってあそこまで来たんだ？まあ、どうでもいいか。

source_text: You might want to stay away from that swamp over there at %2$s. It's got this wicked witch's hut, and let me tell you, it's nothing but trouble.
target_text: あのさ、%2$sの沼から離れた方がいいぜ。魔女の小屋があってさ、マジ危険だぜ。

source_text: Hey, just a friendly tip, but you should steer clear of %2$s. There's this creepy witch who lives in a hut around those parts, and believe me, you don't want to get tangled up in that mess.
target_text: あ、友情情報だけど、%2$sから離れた方がいいな。その辺に気持ち悪い魔女が小屋に住んでんの。マジで、そんなことに巻き込まれたくないだろ。

source_text: Ah, you'll find another village over there, right in the middle of that scorching desert. It's quite lovely, if you don't mind me saying, but I must admit, the whole desert heat makes me feel a little lazy. Can't blame me though, can you?
target_text: ああ、砂漠の向こう側に別の村があるんだ。本当に素敵だと思う。ただし、砂漠の熱さが本当に疲れさせるんだ。気持ちわかるでしょ。本当に疲れるんだ。

source_text: Oh, there's another village over there at %2$s. It's pretty nice, I guess.
target_text: ああ、そこにもう一つ村があります %2$s。かなりいいところだと思います。

source_text: If you venture into the plain at %2$s, you might stumble upon yet another village. It's nothing special, really.
target_text: 平原の%2$sに行ったら、また別の村があるかもな。大したことねえけど。

source_text: Ugh, there's another village at %2$s, but it's scorching hot over there. I can barely muster the energy to visit.
target_text: あ、%2$sに別の村があるんだぜ。でもサバンナは暑くてさ、エネルギーが出ねえんだ。

source_text: Oh, you're talking about that village in the savanna at %2$s? Yeah, they're nice folks, I guess. But honestly, I'd rather take a nap than go see them.
target_text: あ、%2$sのサバンナにある村かあ？まあいい奴ら、だと思うけど。でも正直、昼寝の方がマシかな。

source_text: Oh man, there's this other village over at %2$s. It's like, freezing cold all the time. Brrr!
target_text: おい、そこに別の村があるんだよね %2$s のところ。いつも凍えるくらい寒いんだ。ブリッ！

source_text: Yo, check it out, there's this village at %2$s in the snowy plains. The people are chill and all, but dang, it's like an icebox over there! Can't handle that cold!
target_text: よ、%2$sの雪原に村があるんだぜ。人は良いんだけど、あ、超冷えてるぞ！そんな寒さ、俺は無理。

source_text: Ah, there's this village over yonder in the taiga biome. It's quite lovely, but I wouldn't go there if I were you. Too much effort, you know?
target_text: あ、向こうのタイガバイオームに村があるんだぜ。かなり素敵だけど、よ、行く気ねえ。面倒くせえし。

source_text: Meandering through the taiga biome, you might stumble upon yet another village. It's hidden away, deep in the woods. Not worth the hassle, if you ask me.
target_text: タイガバイオームをぶらぶら歩いたら、また村があるんだ。林の奥深くに隠れてるんだぜ。面倒くせえし。

source_text: Good evening... I guess.
target_text: こんばんは。俺は思う。

source_text: So, how was your day? Mine was... eh, who cares?
target_text: それで、あなたの日はどうでしたか？ 私のは…えっと、誰も気にしませんよね？

source_text: Another day, another burden of work. Sigh.
target_text: 別の日。別の仕事の負担。ため息。

source_text: Time just slipped away, like everything else in life. Too much to handle, too little motivation.
target_text: 時間は他の全てと同じように滑り去った。多すぎる…

source_text: Ugh, the thought of making dinner is exhausting. I might drag myself home soon.
target_text: うわ、夕食を作る考えだけで息が切れそうだ。そろそろ自分で家へ戻るかもしれない。

source_text: Today was a complete waste. I accomplished nothing. Absolutely nothing.
target_text: 今日は完全に無駄だった。何も成し遂げられず、絶対に何もできませんでした。

source_text: I desperately need a nap. The morning sucked the life out of me.
target_text: 絶望的に眠りたい。朝に生気を吸い取られたみたいだ。

source_text: You won't catch me roaming around at night. Last time I did, a creeper scared the life out of me. Not worth it.
target_text: 俺は夜中に徘徊する人間じゃねえ。前、クリーパーに怖がらせられちゃったんだ。面倒くせえし。

source_text: Oh, hello there. Just got back from buying dinner stuff. Can't wait to put in the minimum effort required. See ya later, maybe.
target_text: あ、こんばんは。ちょうど夜飯の買い物から戻ってきたところ。最小限の努力で終わらせたいな。じゃあな。

source_text: Gooood morning... *yawns*
target_text: グーオオオモーニング… *あくび*

source_text: I'm thinking of taking it easy today. My body's just not feeling it, you know?
target_text: 今日はゆっくりしようと思ってる。体調が優れないんだ、わかるでしょ？

source_text: My schedule is packed to the brim today. Just thinking about it makes me want to crawl back into bed.
target_text: 今日のスケジュール満杯だぜ。考えるだけで、ベッドに戻りたくなっちゃう。

source_text: Surprisingly, I actually got a good night's sleep. Maybe it's time to tackle something more challenging today. Or maybe not.
target_text: 信じられんけど、ここんとこ寝付きがいいんだ。今日はもっと難しいことに挑戦する時期かな。…多分違うけど。

source_text: Hey, you ready to do some work today? Or are you still in dreamland?
target_text: おい、今日も仕事に取り掛かる準備はできてる？それともまだ夢の国にいるの？

source_text: Ugh, I'm so tired. You too, huh?
target_text: うわ、もう疲れたよ。君も？

source_text: Woah, you look like you've been through a wild night.
target_text: おお、まるで一晩中ワイルドな夜を過ごしたかのように見えます。

source_text: Wakey wakey, pal. We've got a loooong day ahead of us.
target_text: おはよう、友よ。長い一日が待っているね。

source_text: Did you manage to catch any Z's? You seem oddly energetic.
target_text: Zを捕まえた？不思議とエネルギッシュだね。

source_text: Morning, Mr. Sleepyhead. Don't tell me you're still half-asleep.
target_text: おはよう、スリーピーヘッドさん。まだ半分寝てるって言わないでね。

source_text: What a beautiful morning... I guess. I hope it doesn't mean we have to work harder.
target_text: なんて美しい朝なの…そう思うかもしれないけど、もっと頑張らなきゃならないって意味じゃないといいのに

source_text: Ugh, you're still awake? Don't you have anything better to do?
target_text: ああ、まだ起きてる？何もやることがあるんじゃないか？

source_text: Seriously, dude, get some shut-eye already. You've got a big day ahead of you, or so I've heard.
target_text: 本当に、友よ、もう寝なさい。大きな一日が待っているらしいんだって聞いたよ。

source_text: Wow, you're really committed to staying up late, huh?
target_text: わあ。お前は本当に遅くまで起きることに専念している。ね？

source_text: Nighttime is where it's at, right? I feel you, man.
target_text: 夜間こそが最高だよね？分かるよ、友よ。

source_text: Just a word of advice, buddy - stay close to the village at night. Those creepy creatures are no joke.
target_text: 忠告だけど、夜は村の近くに居た方がいいぜ。あの気持ち悪い奴ら、ヤバいんだよ。

source_text: The guards do their thing, but honestly, the night still gives me the creeps. It's like a horror movie out there, don't you think?
target_text: 衛兵は仕事してるけどさ、正直、夜は怖いんだ。ホラー映画みてえじゃん。

source_text: Ah, darkness. So serene, so peaceful. It's the perfect time to kick back and relax, you know?
target_text: あぁ、闇。とても静かで平和だ。ゆっくり休むには最高の時間だよね？

source_text: Daytime is so overrated. I mean, who needs all that hustle and bustle? Nighttime strolls are where it's at.
target_text: 昼間はつまんねえ。バタバタばっかだし。夜のお散歩が最高だぜ。

source_text: Man, I'm wiped. Today has been exhausting. I might just take it extra easy tomorrow, you feel me?
target_text: マジで疲れ切った。今日は本当に大変だった。明日はもう少しゆっくりしたい、分かる？

source_text: I seriously can't wait to dive into my cozy bed. It's like a little slice of paradise.
target_text: 私は本当に快適なベッドに飛び込むのが待ちきれません。まるで小さな楽園の一片のようです。

source_text: I'm ready to play Rock Paper Scissors!
target_text: ロック・ペーパー・シザーズをプレイする準備はできました！

source_text: Yo, sup.
target_text: やあ、調子はどう？

source_text: Hey, what's crackin'?
target_text: やあ、何が起きてるの？

source_text: Oh hey, didn't see you there.
target_text: あっ、そこにいないかと思ったんだけど。

source_text: Anythin' happening in your world today?
target_text: 今日、お前の世界で何か起きたか？

source_text: How's life treatin' ya?
target_text: 人生はどう？

source_text: Well, well, well, look who it is! What's the scoop?
target_text: さてさて、誰だ？何か情報はあるの？

source_text: You know, I was just chillin' with %supporter%, and outta nowhere this zombie decides to take a bite outta him! But don't worry, he said he's fine, so I went along with it... Wait, what were we talkin' about again? Oh yeah, saw a zombie that could be %supporter%'s twin today!
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: Sorry, but I won't lift a finger without a few more emeralds in my pocket.
target_text: ごめんなさい、もっとエメラルドをポケットに入れないと手を挙げません。

source_text: Seriously? I don't come cheap, buddy. You better cough up some more emeralds.
target_text: 本当に？私は安くは売れないよ、相棒。もっとエメラルドを吐き出したほうがいい。

source_text: Look, I may be available for hire, but I won't budge an inch until I see a lot more emeralds in your hand.
target_text: あ、雇ってくれてもいいけど、翡翠をもっとたくさん見るまでは動かねえぜ。

source_text: I'd rather not rush into procreation until we're absolutely certain about our commitment.
target_text: 結婚に踏み込む前に、私たちがコミットメントについて完全に確信できるまで急ぎたくありません

source_text: Bringing a new life into this world requires a level of dedication and commitment that I'm not quite feeling right now.
target_text: 新しい命を世に生み出すのはさあ、そんな献身と覚悟が必要で…今、俺、その気分じゃねえんだ。

source_text: Why bother choosing anything else? Scissors it is, lazily.
target_text: 他を選ぶ必要はない？ハサミで決めるよ、怠けて。」

source_text: Ugh, fine, I guess I'll go with rock. And surprise, surprise, I lose again!
target_text: うーん、まあいいわね、私は岩を選ぶことにする。サプライズ、サプライズ、また負けちゃった！

source_text: Ugh, scissors? Seriously? Rock just crushed you, I totally win!
target_text: あぁ、はさみ？本当に？岩があなたを粉砕した、私は完全に勝った！

source_text: *Yawn* Paper, I guess. Can we finish this game already? I have a nap schedule to follow.
target_text: *うとうと* 紙か。もうゲーム終わらせてくれない？昼寝スケジュールがあるんだ。

source_text: Nah, rock, I guess...
target_text: まあ、岩だね…

source_text: Scissor, but only because I can't be bothered to think of anything else.
target_text: ハサミ、ただし他の言葉を考える気力がないので。

source_text: Rock is definitely not my go-to move, it never gets me a victory.
target_text: 岩は私のお気に入りの動きではなく、勝利をもたらしません。

source_text: Rock always wins, huh? I should have known better.
target_text: ロックはいつも勝つ、ね？ よく分かっておくべきだった。

source_text: Lazy me, I lost to scissors. I should have just stayed in bed.
target_text: 怠け者私はハサミに負けた。ベッドにいた方がよかった。

source_text: Ugh, rock, paper, scissors, whatever.
target_text: うーん、じゃんけん、何でも構わない。

source_text: Meh, I might win this time, who knows?
target_text: ふん。今回は俺が勝つかもしれない。誰が知ってるか？

source_text: Nah, I'm too lazy to pay attention to the latest gossip.
target_text: いや、私は最新のゴシップに注意を払うほど怠け者です。

source_text: Jax is like, still kind of a big deal, but everyone's, like, totally obsessing over Sirben now. And his prophets, MerlinWolfGames and Crow, are like, spreading his words and stuff.
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: So, there were these Cyberdemons, right? And they totally thought they could invade our cozy little Overworld with their fancy Portals. But, you know what? Sirben and Luke were all, "Nuh-uh, not on our watch!" And they shut that invasion down real quick.
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: Okay, so get this. Remember that Ancient Builder who mysteriously vanished? Well, word on the street is that this lazy dude 2DA50 just up and bounced to the Far Lands, never to be seen again. Talk about taking the easy way out, am I right?
target_text: ほら、古代ビルダーが消えたってウワサあるだろ。その後、あのだらな 2DA50 が遠い土地に行っちゃったんだって。本当にだらけた方法だと思わない？

source_text: Ugh, let me tell you about MerlinWolfGames and his obsession with Sirben. He went and built this temple for him, thinking it's some kind of ancient wonder. Like, come on, dude, get a hobby or something.
target_text: うーん。マーリンウルフゲームスのシルベン執着について教えるけど。あいつ、シルベンのための寺院を建てちゃったんだぜ。なあ、趣味でも持つとか、何かしてくれよ。

source_text: You know, there used to be this super advanced race of builders around here. But, like, they disappeared or something. Probably got tired of all the hard work and decided to take a nice, long vacation. Can't say I blame 'em.
target_text: ほら、昔めっちゃ進化した建築士どもがいたんだ。でも、いなくなっちゃったんだ。みんな疲れたんだろ。本気で、あの長時間労働から休む決心したんだぜ。気持ちわかるわ。

source_text: So, there are these legends, right? About these ancient builders who left all these ruins and temples all over the Overworld. I mean, who knows if they're true or not, but it's pretty cool to imagine, right?
target_text: ほら、昔の建築士についての伝説があるんだぜ。あいつら、オーバーワールド中に遺跡とか寺院とか建てたんだ。聞く価値があるっていうかさ、何か面白いんだぜ。

source_text: Are you kidding? After all that effort to butcher the cow?
target_text: 冗談でしょう？牛を切り刻むためにそんなに努力したのに？

source_text: Nah, I'm good. Too lazy to bother with a handshake.
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: No need to be formal with me. I'm the king of laziness.
target_text: 私と話す時はフォーマルでいらっしゃる必要はないよ。私は怠惰の王さ。

source_text: Oh, for real? This is so out of character for you, man.
target_text: 本当に？それはあなたのキャラから外れた行動だね。

source_text: Ugh, just leave me alone. I can't be bothered with handshakes right now.
target_text: うーん、今は握手なんてしたくない。ひとりでいてほしい。

source_text: Meh, your grip is okay, I guess.
target_text: まあ、握力はまぁまぁだね。

source_text: Your grip is alright, I suppose. Not that impressive though.
target_text: あなたの握力はまあまあだと思う。でもそれほど印象的ではないよ。

source_text: Yeah, whatever, your polite demeanor doesn't really impress me.
target_text: はい、何でもいいけど、あなたの礼儀正しさには感心できません

source_text: *yawns* Good day, I guess.
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: Oh, hey. You're here. What do you want?
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: Nah, not really feeling the whole staying in one place thing. I'm more of a "let's see what's out there" kind of person.
target_text: うーん、一か所に留まるのは俺の好みじゃねえ。『外の世界を見たい』的なタイプなんだ。

source_text: Thanks for the offer, but I have a serious case of wanderlust. I'd rather roam the world and discover new horizons!
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: This village is cool and all, but I'm more of a thrill-seeker. The open road is calling my name, you know?
target_text: この村は良いけどさ、俺はもっとスリルを求めてる人間なんだ。外の世界が呼んでるんだぜ。

source_text: Ugh, this village is like, way too packed.
target_text: うわ、この村はあまりに混雑してる。

source_text: I mean, I could totally stay, but there's, like, zero beds left.
target_text: 実際は滞在できるけど、ベッドがゼロだからね。

source_text: Dude, I just told you that, like, two minutes ago. Can you try to keep up?
target_text: おい、ちょうど二分前に言ったんだよ。追いつけるか試してみてくれる？

source_text: Seriously? You seriously forgot that you already asked me? Wow, just wow.
target_text: 本当に？ あなたがすでに尋ねたことを忘れたんですか？ うわぁ、ただただ驚きます。

source_text: Yeah, whatever, I guess I could stick around this village if I have to.
target_text: まあ、何でもいいけど、この村に残るしかないなら残りますね。

source_text: Meh, I suppose I could tolerate staying in this village for a while.
target_text: まあ、この村にしばらく滞在することには耐えられると思います。

source_text: Pfft! Are you for real? The ender dragon? Yeah, good luck finding that imaginary creature.
target_text: ふふ！本当にそう思ってるの？エンダードラゴン？うん、あの架空の生き物を見つけるのに幸運を祈るよ。

source_text: Seriously? You think a mere mortal could stand a chance against the almighty ender dragon? Dream on, buddy.
target_text: ホンマに？単なる人間があの最強のエンダードラゴンに勝つと思ってんの？夢見るな。

source_text: Wow, you actually managed to bring the dragon egg back? That's pretty cool, I guess.
target_text: ワオ、本当にドラゴンエッグを持ち帰れたの？それはかなりクールだね、まあ。

source_text: Huh, so you're telling me you took down that big ol' dragon? Well, I guess the village will talk about it for, like, a little while.
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: Your tales are so tiresome.
target_text: あなたの物語はとても退屈です。

source_text: Oh, spare me the effort of hearing your worn-out anecdotes, won't you?
target_text: あなたの古びた逸話を聞く手間は省いていただけませんか？

source_text: Interacting with you is like dealing with a sloth trying to be a rocket scientist. Minus the cuteness, of course.
target_text: お前とやり取りするのは、ナマケモノがロケット科学者になろうとしてるようなもん。可愛さはねえけどな。

source_text: Meh, maybe one day I'll bother to explore the world or whatever.
target_text: まあ、いつか世界を探検する気になるかもしれないけど。

source_text: Ugh, I guess it'd be kinda cool to travel and explore. I mean, I love my village and all, but your stories make me feel a bit envious, I guess.
target_text: あ、旅行と探索はマジ良さそうだな。村は好きだけど、お前の話聞いてると、ちょっと嫉妬しちゃう。

source_text: Seriously, who has the energy to be brave and venture into the unknown? Not me, that's for sure.
target_text: 正直に言うと、勇敢に未知へ踏み出すエネルギーを持つ人は誰？私じゃない、確かだよ。

source_text: Ugh, whatever. That's my mom, big deal.
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: Yeah, I don't see how that was remotely enjoyable either.
target_text: そうですね、それがどれほど楽しめたのかも分からない。

source_text: Yeah, yeah, we all know, the village loves to gossip about you.
target_text: うん、うん、私たちは皆知っている、村人はあなたについてゴシップするのが好きです

source_text: Seriously, I can't even bother to understand it...
target_text: 本当に、理解する気もない…

source_text: Oh please, like anyone cares about the feelings of those silly creepers!
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: Seriously, who even cares about a stupid sheep?!
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: *snoring loudly* Huh? Did you say something?
target_text: *いびきが大きく* え？何か言ったの？

source_text: Ugh, what a waste of my precious time that was.
target_text: うわっ、貴重な時間の無駄だった。

source_text: Yawn! This conversation is putting me to sleep.
target_text: あくび！この会話は私を眠らせている。

source_text: Wow, you're certifiably insane, and not in a cool way, just saying.
target_text: わぁ、あなたは確かに狂っているみたいだね、クールな意味ではなくて。ただ言っておくよ。

source_text: I doubt you've ever bothered going to the Nether, man.
target_text: ネザーに行ったことあるかどうか疑わしいけどね。

source_text: Ugh, no wonder those Piglins went all berserk on you. Can't blame 'em.
target_text: うーん、ピグリンが狂った理由もわかりますね。責めることはできません。

source_text: Honestly, I couldn't care less if you've been to the Nether. Your storytelling skills are as dull as dirt.
target_text: 正直、お前がネザーに行ったかどうかなんて、どうでもいいぜ。お前の話、退屈だもん。

source_text: Seriously, look at you! You couldn't even lift a feather, let alone survive in the Nether.
target_text: 真剣に言うと、君は羽毛さえ持ち上げられないくらいだし、ネザーで生き残るなんて無理だね。

source_text: My old man was a legendary Nether explorer, and he never mentioned anything about warped fungus. Nice try, fibber!
target_text: 俺のじいちゃんはネザー探索の伝説だけど、ウォープドキノコなんて話は聞いたことねえぜ。嘘つくな。

source_text: Ugh, is it, like, super hot in that place or something? I can't even deal with heatwaves, let alone the Nether!
target_text: あ、あの場所、超暑いんですか？俺は熱波でも無理なのに、ネザーなんて…。

source_text: Seriously, how on earth did you survive in that crazy dangerous Nether? I mean, I can barely survive a day without my comfy bed and snacks.
target_text: マジで、ネザーの危険な場所でどうやって生き残ったの？俺なんて、居心地のいいベッドとお菓子なしじゃ一日も無理だぜ。

source_text: So, I've heard rumors about tons of treasure in that Nether thing. But, like, I'm way too lazy to even consider stepping foot in there. No treasure is worth that effort, man.
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: Whoa, you must be, like, the bravest soul ever to venture into the Nether. Me? Oh, no way, I'm way too chicken-hearted for that. Definitely not scared, just...lazy, you know?
target_text: あ、ネザーに冒険した最強の人間だな。俺？ありえねえ、マジびびり。…怖くはないけど、だるいんだぜ。

source_text: Dude, have you ever seen one of those Zombified Piglins? I heard they're, like, totally gnarly. But honestly, I'm too lazy to even bother checking them out. Plus, they sound kinda gross.
target_text: あ、ゾンビ化ピグリンとか見たことある？あいつら、マジ鬼畜らしいぜ。でも正直、見に行く気力もねえ。気持ち悪いし。

source_text: Meh, I guess that all happened. Whatever.
target_text: まあ、全部起こったんだろうな。何でもいいよ。

source_text: Ugh, I'm too lazy to even think about taking on a stupid creeper.
target_text: うーん、クリーーパーに対処することさえ考えるのが面倒です。

source_text: That story was alright, I guess. Did you come up with it yourself or something?
target_text: その話はまあまあだったね。自分で思いついたの？それとも何か他に？

source_text: Seriously? All of that happened yesterday? I find that hard to believe.
target_text: 本当に？ すべて昨日起きたんですか？ 信じがたいですね。

source_text: I was probably just chilling nearby yesterday. Can't believe I didn't hear about it though, oh well.
target_text: ああ、昨日はそのへんでぶらぶらしてただけよ。その話を聞かなかったなんて信じられないけど、まあいいや。

source_text: Heh, sounds like %Supporter% is trying way too hard to be cool. Whatever.
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: Ugh, not the Legend of %Supporter% again. Can't you find something else to talk about?
target_text: めんどくさい。

source_text: Oh wow, so that's how you stumbled upon your first diamond? How fascinating. Yawn.
target_text: わあ、最初のダイヤモンドに偶然出会ったんだって？とても興味深いね。うーん。

source_text: Yeah, sure, come over later. I'll pretend to be interested in hearing more of your tales.
target_text: はい、もちろん。後で来てください。もっと話を聞くことに興味があるふりをします

source_text: Honestly, I can't be bothered to believe you.
target_text: 正直言って、あなたを信じる気がしない。

source_text: Does it even matter? You seem way too intact to convince me otherwise.
target_text: 本当に重要ですか？ あなたはそれほど健全に見えるので、私を説得するのは難しいでしょう。

source_text: No way! The Wither goes around causing total chaos, I've heard!
target_text: まじで？ウィザーが混乱を引き起こしていると聞いたよ！

source_text: You actually managed to defeat the Wither?! Seriously, that's mind-blowing!
target_text: あなたが実際にウィザーを倒せたんだ？ 本当に、信じられないほどすごい！

source_text: Oh, sorry, but I'm not really feeling your vibe right now. Can you give me some space?
target_text: スカタン、お前ごめんね！

source_text: Oopsie-doodle! Looks like you accidentally bumped into me. No hard feelings, right?
target_text: わざと攻撃してきたのかごめんね！

source_text: Haha, nice try! But this villager's got some serious moves. I won't be falling for that one, my friend.
target_text: 信じるかごめんね！

source_text: Ouchie-wouchie! That hurt a bit, but hey, let's skip the apologies and focus on making this day amazing!
target_text: その傷、覚えてるごめんね！

source_text: Ah, nope-a-doodle! I appreciate the thought, but I'm not quite ready to accept any apologies just yet. Better luck next time!
target_text: ダメだごめんね！

source_text: No worries, mistakes are just part of the adventure!
target_text: まあいい。誰だって失敗する。

source_text: Oh, don't sweat it! Just keep your eyes peeled next time, champ!
target_text: いいか。次は気をつけろよ。

source_text: Alrighty then, we can let that one slide. But hey, stay on your toes, okay?
target_text: そうだな。今回は許す。だが習慣にするなよ。

source_text: No biggie! We all stumble sometimes. Shake it off and carry on!
target_text: 心配すんな。失敗することもある。

source_text: Hey, it's all good, my friend! Go forth and conquer, without any worries!
target_text: ああ、問題ない。だが気をつけろ。

source_text: Wow, we sure chatted up a storm today! But duty calls, and I must return to the grind.
target_text: やることが山積みだ。話す時間がない。

source_text: Oh, you're just too charming! But alas, my work awaits and I mustn't keep it waiting till sunset.
target_text: 仕事で忙しい。気を散らすわけにはいかない。

source_text: My, oh my! I'm in a bit of a frenzy at the moment. Can we catch up when the chaos subsides?
target_text: やることに追われてるんだ。また後でな。

source_text: Apologies, my friend, but the demands of my work are pressing. Let's reconvene when I'm free.
target_text: 申し訳ないが、仕事が呼んでる。また今度な。

source_text: Oh dear, I left my furnace unattended! We'll need to continue this delightful conversation another time!
target_text: あ、別のことに取られちゃった。また後でな。

source_text: Wow, the desert is always scorching, but who needs winter when you can rock a perpetual tan?
target_text: 砂漠はいつも灼熱だが、永遠に日焼けしたままでいるなら冬はいらないよ？

source_text: Life in this dry desert ain't a walk in the park, but hey, at least we've got this awesome village where we can chow down on food and stay hydrated.
target_text: この乾いた砂漠での暮らしは楽じゃないけど、それでも食べ物が豊富で水にも困らない素敵な村があるじゃない。

source_text: The desert, where the sun never takes a break and the heat is cranked up 24/7!
target_text: 砂漠、太陽が決して休むことなく、熱は24時間いつもオン！

source_text: Oh, the desert heat might fry your skin, but hey, at least I'll always look like a bronzed beauty, or a lobster in need of some aloe.
target_text: 砂漠の熱、本当に厳しいけど、凍える冬がない分マシだね！

source_text: Talk about a stunning nighttime show! The desert sky is like a twinkling canvas, and the cool breeze adds a touch of magic to the experience.
target_text: 素晴らしい夜のショーを話せ。砂漠の空はきらめくキャンバスのようで、涼しい風が経験に魔法のタッチを追加する。

source_text: Whoa, hold on to your hats, folks! This scorching sun is on a whole new level today!
target_text: 皆さん、帽子を握って！今日の猛暑は全く新しいレベルだ！

source_text: Goodness gracious, the sun is blazing like crazy today!
target_text: おお、今日は太陽が激しく燃えている！

source_text: Hey, have you spotted any sneaky rabbits around here? They're like desert ninjas, I tell ya!
target_text: ねえ、こっそり近づくウサギを見た？彼らは砂漠の忍者みたいなものさ

source_text: Ugh, those pesky husks can really ruin your appetite! I swear they have a secret talent for making you ravenous every time they whack you!
target_text: あ、そのしぶとい腐ったゾンビ、マジでお腹を空かせるスペシャル才能があるんだ！あいつに殴られると、本当に食べたくなっちゃう！

source_text: Ouch! Learned my lesson the hard way by hugging a cactus. Gotta watch those prickly pals around here!
target_text: いたた！サボテンを抱っこする失敗を犯しちゃった。このトゲトゲの友達には注意が必要だな！

source_text: Oh my gosh, did you seriously just say that? Hilarious!
target_text: あぁ、本当にそう言ったんですか？笑えるね！

source_text: What is wrong with you? Why are you talking about this? But hey, let's discuss it with enthusiasm!
target_text: 何が悪いんだ？なぜこんなことを話すのか？でもまあ、熱意を持って議論しよう！

source_text: I've heard amazing things about you, and I totally see why everyone thinks that!
target_text: あなたについて素晴らしい噂を聞いたよ。みんながそう思う理由が分かるよ。

source_text: Not even zombies will talk to you... because you're too cool for them!
target_text: ゾンビさえあなたと話す気がありません… 彼らにはあなたほどクールではないからです！

source_text: You're as likable as a witch with a heart of gold!
target_text: あなたは金色の心を持つ魔女ほど好感度が高いですね！

source_text: Don't talk to me or I will call the guards to move you away from me... because we'll have so much fun together!
target_text: 俺に話しかけるな。そさなきゃ。俺は護衛を呼んで。お前を俺から移動させる。なぜなら。俺たちは一緒にたくさんの楽しみを持つから。

source_text: Huh? Oh, sorry, your conversation bored me... just kidding, let's keep talking!
target_text: え？あ、ごめん、君の会話が退屈だった…冗談だよ、続けて話そう！

source_text: Are you done talking? Oh no, please keep going! I'm all ears.
target_text: 話し終わった？ いや、続けて！ 聴きたいよ。

source_text: I wonder if anyone will miss your babbling when your mouth suddenly "stays shut" forever... just kidding, I'll miss it!
target_text: あれ、お前のぶつぶつが永遠に『静か』になるまで、誰かが恋しくなるかな…って冗談！やっぱ恋しくなるよ。

source_text: I'd rather stare at a pig's rear than talk to you... because that sounds like a fun time!
target_text: あなたと話すよりも豚の尻尾を見るほうが好きです…それは楽しい時間になるようです

source_text: Are you finished talking to me? Oh, come on, keep going! I'm hanging on your every word.
target_text: 話すのは終わったの？いや、続けてよ！君の言葉に必死でついていってるんだから。

source_text: Wow, I can't even believe it exploded on its own. That's wild!
target_text: わあ。自分でそれが爆発したことは信じられない。それはワイルドだ。

source_text: What, you believe the earth is round? What do you mean round? No corners? You seriously believe that? That's amazing!
target_text: ちょ待てよ！お前、本当に地球は丸いと思ってんの？丸いって？隅がない？そんなこと、信じるのか？スゲエ！

source_text: Hold your horses! You genuinely think the earth is round? Ha! Not buying it, my friend! Are you suggesting it's like a big sphere with no corners? That's pure madness!
target_text: 待ってお待ちを！地球が丸いって…マジで？信じられねえわ、友よ！球体で隅がないってか？そりゃ狂気の沙汰だ！

source_text: You know what? You're not just cool, you're the coolest!
target_text: 知ってる？ あなたはただクールではなく、最高だ！

source_text: Show off much? But hey, I guess you have something to show off about.
target_text: 見せびらかすのが好きですか？でも、あなたには何か見せたいことがあると思います。

source_text: Ugh, go away! Wait, are you dressed like you're from the future? So cool!
target_text: ああ。失せろ。待てよ。お前は未来から来たように服装してるのか？本当にクール。

source_text: That is such a silly thing to talk about, but hey, let's do it!
target_text: そんなに馬鹿げたことを話す必要はないけど、やろうか！

source_text: Why are you talking to me again? I mean, I'm flattered, but why?!
target_text: また話しかけるの？ 嬉しいけど、なぜだ？

source_text: Huh? Did you say something? Sorry, I was lost in my own fabulous thoughts.
target_text: えっ？何か言ったの？ごめんなさい、自分の素敵な考えに夢中だっただけです。

source_text: Excuse me? Oh, sorry, I was too busy being amazing to pay attention.
target_text: すみません？あ、ごめんなさい、素晴らしくあるために注意を払う余裕がありませんでした。

source_text: Aren't the plains just amazing? I can't get enough of this place! Maybe someday I'll venture out and explore the world, but for now, I'm perfectly content right here.
target_text: 平原ってマジ素晴らしいじゃん？ハマっちゃった。いつか冒険に出かけたいけど、今は最高に満足してる。

source_text: There's something truly magical about the plains, don't you think? It may not have the same thrills as other biomes, but it has a charm that's unmatched. I wouldn't trade it for anything.
target_text: 平原には何か不思議な魔法があると思わない？他のバイオームほど盛り上がりはないけど、手に入らないくらいの魅力があるんだ。

source_text: Oh, have you ever seen the plains at night? It's like stepping into a dream! The beauty is simply breathtaking, and the tranquility it brings is like a lullaby for the soul.
target_text: あ、夜の平原を見たことある？夢の世界に迷い込んだようだぜ！美しさは本当に息を呑むほどで、その静けさは魂へのないしょくちんのようだ。

source_text: Nights like these, I just want to lie down, gaze at the stars, and let my mind wander. It's a moment of serenity amidst the hustle and bustle of Minecraft life.
target_text: こんな夜、寝ころんで、星をぼーっと見て、頭を放っときたいんだ。それは、ゲームの喧噪の中での瞬間の平穏。

source_text: Ah, the air in the plains! So crisp, so invigorating! It's like taking a big gulp of joy with each breath. Trust me, it's even better than the refreshing taiga air!
target_text: あ、平原の空気！こんなに爽やか、こんなに澄んでる！それぞれの呼吸で喜びをゴクゴク飲み込むような感じ。タイガの空気よりもっと良いんだぜ。

source_text: Sure, the plains may not be as flashy as some other biomes, but that's what makes it special! It's a place of simplicity and purity, where true beauty lies in the little things.
target_text: 確かに平原は派手じゃないけど、だからこそ特別なんだ。シンプルと純粋の場所で、真の美しさは小さなことの中にあるんだ。

source_text: Whenever the weather is like this, it takes me back to my childhood days. I used to frolic in the fields, picking wildflowers and daydreaming about love. Ah, those were the days!
target_text: 天気がこんな感じだと、子供の頃に戻ったみたい。野原で走り回ったり、花を摘んだり、恋を夢見たり。あ、あの日々よ。

source_text: Rise and shine, my friend! The morning sunrise in the plains is an absolute masterpiece! The colors, the warmth, it's like nature's way of saying, "Good morning, world!" You simply must witness it at least once in your lifetime.
target_text: 目覚めて、友よ。平原の朝日は本当にマスターピース。色彩、温かさ、まるで自然からの『おはようございます、世界』というメッセージのようだ。きっと人生で一度は見とくべき景色だぜ。

source_text: Wow, it's scorching out here in the savanna! But hey, at least we never have to deal with that pesky winter.
target_text: うわ、サバンナは日差しが強いな。でも冬の厄介なことに悩まされなくていいし、ここは最高だ。

source_text: Ugh, those llamas can be a bit annoying sometimes, but I'm still totally vibing with this place.
target_text: うーん、そのラマは時々イライラするけど、この場所にはまだ完全にハマってるよ。

source_text: Can we talk about the incredible architecture in the savanna? It's like the coolest thing ever, and that's why I chose to call this place home.
target_text: サバンナの建築について話そうよ。最高にイケてるし、だからここを家に選んだんだ。

source_text: Oh, you think the savanna biome is plain and generic? Well, let me tell you, it's got some seriously awesome perks if you know where to look!
target_text: あ、サバンナが単調で普通だと思った？ちょ待て、よく見ると本当にスゴイ利点があるんだぜ。

source_text: Forget the desert villages, we've got something they don't
target_text: 砂漠の村は忘れましょう、彼らにはない何かがあります。

source_text: The hills and terrains in the savanna are absolutely mind-blowing! It's like Mother Nature went all out to make this place a sight to behold.
target_text: サバンナの丘と地形は本当に息を呑むほど！自然がこの場所を見た目の傑作にするために全力を尽くした感じだぜ。

source_text: Whew, when it's scorching hot, thank goodness for those amazing acacia trees providing some much-needed shade. It's like my own personal oasis in this crazy heat!
target_text: うわ、猛暑の時は、アカシアの木に感謝だぜ。こんなに素敵な日中の休息場所。自分だけのオアシスな感じ！

source_text: Let me tell you a secret
target_text: 秘密を教えるね

source_text: Brrr, it's chilly around here, but as long as I have my cozy sweater and a cup of hot cocoa, I'm good to go!
target_text: ぶぶぶ、冷えてるけど、ゴア好みのセーターとホットココアがあれば大丈夫だぜ。

source_text: Oh boy, it's absolutely frigid out here! But hey, at least I can show off my ice-skating skills on the frozen lake. Whee!
target_text: ああ。外は本当に冷たい。でも、ねえ。少なくとも。俺は凍った湖でアイススケートのスキルを披露できる。わーい。

source_text: When it's this cold, I just love bundling up in a fluffy blanket, sipping on some steaming tea, and binge-watching my favorite shows. Ah, pure bliss!
target_text: こんな寒い時は、ふわふわの毛布に包まって、熱いお茶を飲みながら、好きなドラマを見てるのがいい。あ、最高だ。

source_text: Whenever I see snowflakes falling, it's like a magical invitation to relive my childhood memories of building enormous snow forts and having epic snowball battles with my gang. Good times, good times.
target_text: 雪が降ると、子供の頃の思い出がよみがえっちゃう。でっかい雪の砦を作ったり、友達とぶつけ合いしたり。懐かしいな。

source_text: Geez, those sneaky strays are such a pain in the neck around here, aren't they? I mean, come on, couldn't they find somewhere warmer to hang out? Sheesh!
target_text: ああ。あの狡猾な放浪者は本当に厄介だ。ね？つまり。来い。より温かい場所に行かなかったか？ふぅ。

source_text: Heads up, folks! The guards have caught sight of those pesky wolves roaming nearby. Time to be extra cautious and avoid any unexpected doggy encounters.
target_text: 聞いて！衛兵がその辺をうろついてるオオカミを目撃したんだ。気をつけないと、想定外の犬との会話になっちゃう。

source_text: You know what's the worst? Accidentally bumping into an iron golem and getting stuck like glue for the whole day. Talk about a major inconvenience, am I right?
target_text: 最悪なのはアイアンゴーレムにぶつかっちゃうことなんだ。そうなると一日中そっついたまんま。マジで不便だぜ。

source_text: Ahh, nothing beats the nostalgia of my childhood, when my parents would surprise me with a pumpkin and we'd have the best time crafting snow golems together. And let's not forget the delicious pumpkin pie afterward. Yum!
target_text: ああ、懐かしい子どもの頃。両親が驚かせてくれた。かぼちゃと雪ゴーレムを一緒に作ったあの時のことを。その後、おいしいかぼちゃパイを食べた。本当にうまかったなぁ。

source_text: Wow, cookies and milk are like the ultimate snack combo, don't you think?
target_text: わあ。クッキーとミルクは最終的なスナックコンボのようだ。思わないか？

source_text: I'm quite curious myself about what happened to %Supporter%. They embarked on an adventure about a year ago, and I wonder where they are now.
target_text: わーい！

source_text: Hold on, have you heard the latest gossip about %Supporter%? Brace yourself for some wild news!
target_text: わーい！

source_text: I've been super busy lately, but I've been seriously considering adopting one of those adorable stray cats wandering around. They're just too cute to resist!
target_text: 最近は忙しくてさあ、でも野良猫の里子をもらいたいんだ。可愛くてたまんないもん。

source_text: You know what? I've been meaning to give my house a total makeover. It's time to spruce things up a bit, even if my laziness tries to get in the way!
target_text: 知ってるか？俺は家をトータルリメイクしようとしていた。物事を少し整えるのは時間だ。たとえ俺の怠け者が邪魔をしようとしても。

source_text: One day, I hope to have a bunch of little ones running around. Just need to find my perfect partner in crime first!
target_text: いつか、いっぱい子供を走り回せたらいいな。でもまず、最高のパートナーを見つけないとな。

source_text: I can't help but wonder what life would be like if I chose to live in that other village. The grass is always greener, right?
target_text: あの違う村で暮らしてたら…ってよく思う。隣の芝は青いもんだぜ？

source_text: Ahh, sometimes I get all nostalgic and miss my childhood. Those were the days filled with countless unforgettable memories.
